name: Gary F Moody
text:
Great massage experience with Melissa! My daughter is a dancer and has many knots in her back from lifting her team mates and general stiffness from the dancing activity. Melissa did a wonderful job of helping her feel relaxed and working the knots out.

The place is small, but professional and clean. Honestly, they are focused on the clients comfort and tension so not having some large elaborate office is putting the focus on the right place - on free customer. Well done ladies!

If you are vacationing and wish to treat yourself to a massage and don't know where to go and get your money's worth? Stop researching and call The Massage Office today. Get on their calendar before it is booked up. You have found your vacation massage team!

resp.text:
Gary
Thank you so much for taking the time to give such great feedback.
It always helps to hear from the clients and their perspectives. Also thank you for the pictures.
We hope to see you again when you get to Gulf Shores!

name: Shelby Chapman
text: Today I had the most amazing massage and cupping therapy session with Melissa Millson at The Massage Office in Gulf Shores. She gives great attention to detail and uncovered my specific needs to give me the best possible experience. I am already looking forward to my next session with Melissa! Remember to invest in yourself this holiday season ✨

resp.text:
Thank you for the kind words Shelby!
It was my honor to work on you, and I look forward to next time and more cupping!

name: Sam Seaton
text:
My boyfriend and I wanted to get massages while we were on vacation. I had never gotten a professional massage before, so I wasn’t sure what to look for. I picked this place because their website was extremely informative on what to expect for a first timer, and the other reviews were glowing. Melissa and Joyce were wonderful! They were very relaxing to be around, and Melissa did a wonderful job and made sure I was comfortable the entire way through. My boyfriend, who’s gotten quite a few massages before, was very happy with Joyce’s deep-tissue massage. I walked out of it feeling so relaxed, I almost couldn’t drive!

If you’re looking to really do some self-care right while you’re here, I definitely recommend coming to The Massage Office early in your trip. We’ll definitely be back next time we’re in town!

name: R S
text:
I told Melissa what I expected and enjoyed in a massage and she delivered.
She was very thorough, obviously knew her anatomy and techniques, and made me feel very comfortable.
As a former massage therapist,  I can say this was a worthy massage.

resp.text:
Thank you Robin!
I’m so happy you enjoyed your massage. It was my privilege! I look forward to seeing you again🤗

name: Rayah Gilliland
text: Joyce was wonderful! We will definitely be coming back. Very knowledgeable and helpful. We are from Oklahoma and it was the best massage I've had. It wasnt just a massage it was for healing as well. Definitely recommend!

resp.text:
We are so happy you enjoyed your massage! Thank you for sharing your experience.
We look forward to seeing you next time you visit Gulf Shores.

name: JAMES GRIFFIN
text: Melissa is a true professional and the best masseuse in the area! Always a great experience at her office! Highly recommended.

resp.text:
Thank you James!
I hope to see you again soon.

name: Shopgirl18
text: The Massage Office has been my go to place when I am in need of a great massage. It's in a good location, easy to get to right in the middle of Gulf Shores. Joyce Butts has been a favorite of my husband and I for over 10 years! It's a quality service in a relaxing , professional environment.  We highly recommend giving her a call . You will not be disappointed!

name: Jim Kellum
text: We are in town for the weekend and my husband booked me a massage for my birthday. Melissa was a doll - super sweet and professional and very very good. One of the best massages I've ever had. Will definitely be back next time we are in town.

name: Brandi Kenney
text: Booked a massage very last minute while down at Gulf Shores for vacation.  I do not regret this decision, this was a perfect addition to my trip!  Joyce was very professional and did a wonderful job. If I'm ever back in the area, I will be booking here again.

name: Leta Johnson
text:
Every vacation to Gulf Shores I book a session with Melissa. I've never been disappointed.
Melissa has the listening skills and the hands on skill to work out all the stress and knots from traveling.
I highly recommend Melissa Millson if you're in the Gulf Shores area.
Thanks Melissa see the next time we're in the area.

name: Desiree Presley
text: I had a great massage with Melissa!! I’ll be back on my next trip to Gulf Shores!!

resp.text:
I’m so happy you enjoyed your massage!
Looking forward to seeing you next time you make it to Gulf Shores.
Thank you!
Melissa
The Massage Office

name: Heather Buechler
text: Easy to get to location, comfy space, relaxing music, fantastic essential oils, and the best part is Melissa!  My massage was soooo relaxing and she got out all the tough knots in my back- can't wait to go back on my next visit to Orange Beach!

name: Kathleen Turner
text: Absolute best massage yesterday by Joyce  My back & hips were hurting so bad & when I walked out felt 100% better

name: Gwen Kievit
text: Excellent,  excellent massage!! Clean, relaxing atmosphere,  and two super nice women!! I recommend it highly!!

Wonderful and relaxing ...
Melissa always gets the right area that need the deep work.

name: Molly Wolf
text: Hands down the best massage ever!

name: Timbo Duncan
text: Very nice place, great massage.

name: Kayleigh Storey
text: My massage with Alex was amazing! I’ve had quite a few professional massages and this was one of the best I’ve ever had. She worked out my knots very well to the point that my husband even was amazed because he’s never felt my shoulders loose without knots! Scheduling was even very easy and they were able to get me in the following week. Thank you so much and I will be coming back!

name: susan vinson
text: Alexandria did a great job on me. I feel much better and booked another appointment. I highly recommend them!

name: Brandon Thompson
text: If you yearn for the days of customer service, then LumaLife Therapy is the massage and wellness center for you.  Upon arrival I was greeted by courteous staff in a cozy atmosphere that promoted relaxation.  In addition to traditional massage therapy the clinic offers modern services such as cupping, wellness coaching, and tailored health services.  The prices are reasonable, so much that its easy to be a return customer.  A massage shouldn't have to mean it's a special occasion, and with LumaLife Therapy it doesn't have to be.

resp.text: THANK YOU!!!

name: Rebecca Johnson
text:
So unprofessional. I cannot believe this place has so many 5 star reviews. They did not gove me a pleasant experience and I did not even receive a massage. I scheduled an appointment for a Massage using Groupon on a Saturday in
March. Later I realized I had a scheduling conflict so I rescheduled for a different day. When I came in they had it scheduled for next month on the same day. I remember distinctly scheduling my appointment for this day this month because I TOOK THE DAY OFF for this appointment. I would not have scheduled an appointment incorrectly when I was specifically scheduling it for the day I asked off. So when I arrived they said that I could reschedule. So I tried to schedule it for a day I’m off so I don’t have to ask off again and apparently Saturday’s are only for members! How did I first schedule my appointment for a Saturday then? I’m not a member but I still had it scheduled! Please give me an explanation for this. However, Groupon helped me with my issue and allowed me to trade in my voucher. If I have any advice for anyone thinking about using this company. Don’t.

name: Joan Marie Stewart
text: The Massage Therapists at LumaLife are extremely well trained!  After my recent 90 minute massage, my neck and back had never felt looser!  I stood taller. The massages are truly therapeutic.  I was so relaxed that I wished someone could have driven me home!  The massage table is extremely comfortable - the bedding adds so much to your massage.  The spa is very private, super clean and relaxing.  If you want to really treat your body and mind with relaxation and rejuvenation, then you need to rely on LumaLife for your massages.  Simply a cut way above and I have had massages all over the world and at world class spas and hotels.  At LumaLife, you are relying on true professionals who care about your massage making a difference for your body and mind.

name: Ilka Porter
text: Amazing! Liz is the best. Hands down, the best. You'll never go to anyone else again. Update: Alex and Kallie are amazing too. Very attentive! I have a monthly membership and it's the best thing I've ever done for myself. And take some time to slow down and take advantage of the quiet room.

name: rebecca kidder
text: The ABSOLUTE BEST massage in the world. I went to see Liz a couple years ago and haven't been to anyone else since. She is very consistent and thorough. Lumalife is the most relaxing atmosphere in such a cozy spot -- I've yet to stay awake for the entire session!

name: Eleanor Inge
text: The LumaLife massage therapists have got the touch!!! So relaxing, so professional, such a beautiful studio! I love to buy gift certificates for friends and family! Liz is the best!! I have never had a better massage in my life! FIVE STARS!

name: Chance Worthy
text:
I can't say enough how much I enjoy and love going to this salon. I've always bounced around every time I need to get a haircut. I'm kinda too picky when it comes to the hair style I want to achieve. Every time I wanted to try something new I can always count on Pure being on board and willing to lend a very knowledgeable hand on how we can go about it achieving the style I want. I also love more than anything to relationship I have with my Stylist, Evan! Oh gosh I mean you can't ask for a better stylist. I love sending pictures when I can of new styles to try out. He has truly become a friend of mine. I would highly recommend going to this salon.
Overall great environment, excellent staff, and you can count on walking out look A list good!

name: Kitty Harris
text: I tended to jump around for haircuts until my daughter urged me to try Pure. As long as Evan is there it is my place! Members' of my family have gone there for massages, waxing, hair coloring, body wraps, eyelash extensions and whatever else they wanted! I have never had to wait. Exquisite attention to detail-concern for what I, the favorite customer, desire. That is how I feel when I am there!

name: PAISLEY Wright
text: Pure Salon & Spa offers the highest standard of service of any Salon in the area. Pure has a mobile app that list all the services and the prices. The Staff goes above and beyond to make sure everyone is given the utmost attention needed to make all the services offered a great experience.

name: Preston Taylor
text: I would highly recommend anyone in the area to check out Pure Salon & Spa. Their staff is amazing and the atmosphere is great! I wouldn't go anywhere else to get my hair done.

name: Skye Dempsey
text: Nicole was great! My lashes look great and she answered all my questions! She was very knowledgeable and did a great job :)

name: Theresa C
text: So, I had a great experience with Nicole and a lash tint/lift! The power was out at the building, so she called me and offered an in home service. She is so sweet, and I felt like she was a friend without having met her before! I got lost and she was understanding about it. I had a small freak out moment, but Nicole eased my nerves about the situation and made me feel so comfortable! My eye lashes are no longer straight as a board! 😂😂 I love them now! I would 5/5 recommend Nicole!

name: Mary Beth Rodriguez
text: Nicole was the one who did my lash lift. She did amazing and I was more than happy with the outcome! She was extremely professional and she explained to me exactly what she was doing. I definitely recommend Nicole and iron city lash bar!

name: SKYLAR SHANKS
text: i came from Oklahoma and Nicole removed my terrible lash extensions. she was so sweet and helpful. she truly saved my natural lashes, or what was left of them. 10/10 would recommend

name: kennedy brock
text: Nicole is amazing! I had never gotten my eyelashes done before so I was super nervous but Nicole made me feel so comfortable! She’s super talented and takes her time with every single detail. She’s super considerate of your eye shape and what will look best!! I adored going to see Nicole! Would highly recommend.

name: Shelby Hawkins
text: Nicole is AMAZING! My first time I got lash extensions, I went to a different business and they ended up looking so unnatural and also uncomfortable. My real lashes were actually starting to fall out. Nicole took the time to remove the rest of my old lashes and fill them in with soft natural-looking lashes. I have gone to Nicole ever since and I will not use anyone but her! I get so many compliments on them every time she does them. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

name: Taylor Amundsen
text: Totally worth it. I love Nicole!! She knows what’s she’s doing and gives great advice to keep them in tip top shape. I went the cheap route and was very disappointed. Nicole did a great job and I will be going back.

name: Katie Madamba
text: I’ve been to a few places in Birmingham for lash extensions, and Nicole is by far the best. The quality of the lashes are amazing! Unlike some places I’ve been to, she asks for the exact look you’re going for and does what looks best for the size/shape of your eye. I’ve been going consistently for a few months to Nicole for fills and will most definitely continue to be a returning customer.

name: monica sanchez-diu
text: This place is amazing!! Truly impressed! I was so pleased with my appointment from start to finish! Everything is clean and new. The staff is very friendly and professional. I decided to get my lashes done for the first time here. I was excited, but nervous, as I didn’t know which ones to get, and wanted them to look natural. Nicole, the owner, advised me on which style would look best on me, and she was, in fact, very knowledgeable. They are just....wow! I am so happy with the outcome. They are so pretty. I have been receiving compliments left and right. Can’t wait to go back for my refill. I definitely plan on getting more services here. I see this company doing great things in the future, keep up the great work!

name: Anna Nash
text: I wear glasses and was happy to hide my eyes behind them until meeting Nicole. She walked me through the entire process of lash extensions putting my mind at ease before we began. I could have taken a nap it was so calming! I don’t often pamper myself but now this just may be my new thing! Nicole will make you feel like a friend knowing all the things that will make you feel comfortable at the lash bar!

name: Rachel Foster
text: Can’t say enough good things about Iron City Lash Bar! This was my first time getting eyelash extensions, and Nicole did an awesome job! She explained the process to me and worked with me to figure out the best style for my eye shape and lifestyle. The whole experience was very enjoyable. Can’t wait to go back for my first fill!

name: Jenni Kime
text: Just went in for a fill in today and it was another wonderful experience. Noelia is so sweet! She is very professional and detail oriented. I LOVE my results. I have found the best lash bar in town. The customer service is wonderful, results are amazing and pricing is very reasonable. ❤️

name: Rebecca Fleisig
text: I had a lash lift and brow wax done here and it was the best I’ve had in Birmingham! Noelia was extremely professional, kind, and welcoming. She walked me through every step and assured me she was using the highest quality products available. Iron City Lash Bar’s pricing is unbeatable, and the service isn’t compromised for the price whatsoever! Additionally, I normally am extremely red and break out after an eyebrow wax, but I didn’t at all due to her use of hard wax and a wax specifically for sensitive skin. I cannot recommend Iron City Lash Bar enough, and I will 100% be back!!

name: Que-Lynn Tran
text: Nicole is my new go-to lash tech! I've recently gotten into lash extensions and have been shopping around for a good lash tech. I made the mistake of going the cheap route and the previous lady had glued the lashes onto my actual eyelid, which was making my natural lashes fall out. Nicole squeezed me into her schedule and was able to rescue my lashes, and I can't thank her enough! Nicole is very talented and uses high quality products on her clients. My new lashes are totally on fleek!

name: alissa milam
text: IM OBSESSED!!! I had eye lash extensions done for the first time! I was very hesitant because i did not want them to be too exaggerated or look over the top ( like i was trying to hard) However i told this to Nicole and said how i want them natural looking. I also showed her pictures of what I was going for! From there she walked me through what she suggests and why she feels like I would like this certain lash and style. She knows her stuff and is truly an artist! Not only is she so talented, but she is so sweet and personable. She is so easy to talk to and takes great care of you making sure you are comfortable through your whole appointment. Thank you again Nicole! And I cant wait to get a fill and catch up in a couple weeks!

name: Grace Carpenter
text: Absolutely amazing experience. Highly recommend to anyone in the Birmingham area!!!

name: Beau Murdock
text: Finally!  Birmingham has its first official Lash Bar!  Nicole is awesome!  Extremely knowledgeable, listens to you, actually looks at your lashes to select the best option for your eye shape, and a relaxed fun atmosphere!!

name: Gabby R
text: This place was the BEST. I got my brows waxed and tinted and they turned out great!!! The prices were great and I would HIGHLY recommend this place. The esthetician was so nice and welcoming I felt right at home. Will definitely be back.

name: Kiran Chander
text: Went to Nicole for eyelash extensions and it turned out phenomenal! Definitely the best lash bar in town! Already can’t wait for a fill in with her!

name: Lindsey Ring
text: I got eyelash extensions, which I’d never had before.  With the extensions it eliminates the need for eyeliner and mascara, making it so much faster putting on my makeup. I’ve received so many compliments and will definitely be returning!

name: D M
text: This was my first time to try a lash lift.  I really loved the experience.  It was very clean and I got to relax back in a reclining chair.  Noelia was super sweet and professional.  She is a licensed esthetician so I felt like I was in good hands.  She was very knowledgeable and answered all of my questions.  I will definitely be doing this again.  I love the way they look.

name: Liz G
text:
I would recommend 100% this place!
Nicole did a great job on my eyelashes. She really make sure my lashes look the way I wanted them. I would definitely come back!

name: Sydney Detweiler
text:
Since moving here in March, I can officially call off my search for a new lash place! I had been getting lash extensions for 3 three years before moving here and none of the places around Birmingham to sing to my heart (and wallet) like Iron City Lash Bar! This time I decided to try a Lash Lift rather than my normal extensions due to upkeep and I am beyond pleased! While a lift doesn't give the same va-voom that lash extensions do, I have still gotten "are those your real lashes?!" on a few occasions since getting my lift. Goodbye mascara on the daily!

I am so grateful to have found Iron City Lash Bar!

name: Smileyforty
text: Mandy is very friendly & patient as she helped pamper my wheelchair bound Mama.

My nails were not even what so ever! I called back to get them fixed and they made me pay for them to be fixed, and still un-even after I had asked her again to file them correctly!

name: Sade Jackson
text: I had a great experience here. I used to go to the nail salon by Walmart on east south blvd since I've been living here I went three times there but soon my regular technician moved shops and relocated here at Elegant nails. This is how I found elegant nails. I just had to find the lady she does a wonderful job . When I walked in I was greeted by one of the techs but I was only looking for the woman sad to say I do not even know her name well she was busy and I allowed the other tech to at least take off my polish and nails. Well he seemed to be very knowledgeable and experienced with his job through your communication so I allowed him to earn my trust and he did a wonderful job as well as who turned out to be his wife who drew me to the shop in the first place. I will continue to return to Elegant nails. Money well spent.

name: Tracy Maxwell
text: The Staff is kind, professional, and they are great nail technicians.  The atmosphere is relaxing.  It was pouring down raining and Tiffany escorted me to my car with with her umbrella.  Definitely, she went out of her way.

name: Renee Flynn
text: The owner Renee is a trip she gave me a filling on Sunday turned around had to go back on Wednesday to get repaired got changed for that when it’s clear they at fault because the nail slide off the nail bed then had to go back on Thursday to get another one repaired got charged for that one I will never go there again you try and give people chances to make it right some people just don’t get

name: Ti Noms
text: Great service and attitudes! Many new colors and the remodeling job looks very nice.

name: Robyn Peacock
text: Comfortable new chairs; beautiful decor; friendly staff; manicure/pedicure perfection!

name: Karen Harris
text:
Stopped here for a basic manicure since my regular salon was unable to see me.  There was only one other customer who was in the midst of a pedicure and two nail techs.  The tech, who was busy on his iPad, sat me down and continued utilizing his iPad. He didn't soak my cuticles, just showed me to a chair.  The second nail tech attended me after he was finish with the current client's pedicure.

I brought my own polish, but they do offer a nice selection of colors and brands. However, they use very cheap and generic base and top coats which did nothing for my OPI polish. I was chipping by the time I made it to my car.  Furthmore, the cost was $14.00 for probably the worst manicure I've had in years.  Extremely overpriced, especially since the salon was using cheap products.

I probably would have gave it 1 star, but the tech who did my manicure was very polite. I would not recommend this place, especially if you're accustomed to quality service and products. I definitely will not be back.

name: Kali Holland
text: Amazing customer service!! Highly recommend

name: Miss Bennett
text: Truly a hidden gem😊💕

text: We absolutely love this salon & the staff is incredible! It is very clean and professional. Tannar has been doing hair for my family a little over a year & always exceeds our expectations! name: Kerri Cole
text: I came to this salon with fried, over-processed hair with a strip of hair had broken off almost to my scalp.  I saw Taylor Carver and she miraculously saved the day! Taylor did a botanical conditioning treatment as well as coloring and cutting my hair. Amazingly she camouflaged the bare spot on my scalp and made my hair look the best it's ever been! I get compliments from everyone on my hair since seeing Taylor.  She transformed my dry, brittle, broken, pitiful hair into a gorgeous color that is my favorite that I've ever had! The staff is so courteous, helpful and pleasant. The salon has shampoo bowls that lift to fit your head so you're not leaning backward. They even give a mini stress relieving massage after shampooing your hair! I'll never go anywhere else!!!

text: I made my first visit to Amplify last week to enjoy hand/foot reflexology. Packing and moving cross country left my hands and feet very sore.  My appointment time was set quickly by very friendly staff who also warmly welcomed me. The spa is clean, comfortable and relaxing.  The service offering is very good, very reasonably priced, and my massage by Jonathan just what I needed.  He made sure he fully understood my needs before beginning the treatment.  I will be returning soon to try other services, and highly recommend the spa to all.

text: I'm a little disappointed with the service provided. First of all, the price was ridiculous. $43 for just the cut. No style/blow dry nothing. After I got back home I noticed how uneven my hair was. For the price, I expected better service!

resp.text: Hey Casey,  I am so sorry we didn't meet your expectations.  Would you please email me when you get a chance, joeygraham1971@gmail.com.   I would love to give you a couple of haircuts with complimentary botanical treatments with any stylist of your choice.

text: Jody is my go to stylists and is very very good at men's cuts. Professional staff with great customer service, and can't go wrong with Aveda

name: Cait Blankenship
text: I have been getting my haircut at Amplify for almost 5 years now. I've seen many different stylists and have never been disappointed.

name: Ronald Howell II
text:
Had my hair cut by a lady named Tonya (I think)(spelling may not be correct).  She was amazing!!  Great personality, she kept a good conversation going, and gave a nice looking haircut.  The wash prior to my cut was nice, the lady even gave a small massage before the wash.  You may be wondering after saying all that why I would give three stars?...  Well, I'd suggest bringing in a picture of what you want.  Because my hair isn't anything like what I asked for.  I went in with longer hair and she held up an amount to ask if that's what I wanted cut off, to which I agreed (about half an inch at most).  My hair went from around 3.5 inches to .5 inches.  It's so short I can't even put a part without having my hair just spike straight up.  So, I'm most likely going somewhere today to just have it shaved and start over.  On top of all that, I was told it was around a $20 cut, I paid $32 to have someone cut all my hair off.  BUT, I'm willing to bet if you brought in a picture she could probably cut to the picture with ease.  I kinda hate leaving this review, but I'd rather do this and save someone the stress of going from long hair to short hair unintentionally.

Update:  I am reducing the stars.  It would seem that if a person actually cared about their business and a customer had such a valid complaint, they would at least reach out and inquire as to what exactly transpired and how it could be fixed.  I left this review over a month ago and have yet to hear from anyone.  Doesn't seem that they actually care about customer satisfaction, hence the drop in personal rating.  I still maintain that the lady who cut my hair was nice, but niceness doesn't really do anything for a bad haircut, or for a displeased customer who didn't even get an "I'm sorry"...... Doesn't look like I will be going back to this salon.

name: Tori W
text: Great location & great staff. They are an Aveda salon in the nice  Old Cloverdale area. They offer a wide variety of salon services & hair care, including manicures & facials.

I'm so disappointed with my hair...
I have long thick hair and needed some layers and weight taken off. I showed the stylist what I would like to have done and she did the complete opposite. I wanted a manageable hairstyle with feathered ends. What I got was a blunt haircut with random blunt layers. I. Hate. It.

text: I was so pleased with my experience at Alabama Sleep Aesthetics. I’ve been in need of a sleep study for a while but my anxiety had been triggering my procrastination. After finally biting the bullet and making the appointment I was really nervous about going in overnight. My WONDERFUL nurse Melissa put me so at ease with her expertise and amazing sense of humor. Though newly acquainted she was the type of nurse that made me feel I had known her for years and could trust her. I even requested her specifically when I had to go in for a second night. I would recommend this sleep center for everything from the print doctor call-backs to their kind and compassionate staff and nurses like Melissa. Thank you for a wonderful and informative experience.

name: Ronny Perkins
text: Great place! Made the sleep study as comfortable as possible. Very friendly staff, comfortable beds and rooms were very decorative and homey.

name: donna reinaker
text:
I now understand the expression “a good night’s sleep!!”

My cardiologist explained the relationship of
My A-fib to sleep apnea and referred me to Dr Stephen for a consultation and sleep study.

My study revealed sleep apnea as Dr Stephen predicted and consequently fit me with a CPAP
Machine.

The experience could not have been more positive. Dr Stephen explained the process and
Results in plain terms, taking as much time as I needed for questions.

Each staff member that I encountered was
Professional, knowledgeable and kind.

I wake up RESTED, and no longer crave an afternoon nap!!

Thank you Alabama Sleep and Aesthetics!

name: Royce Karina
text: So I was on a 13 hour road trip going from Florida to Texas, and as one would do during their drive, I couldn’t help but notice my unsightly nails as they were directly in front of me as I steered the steering wheel. I decided that before I check in my hotel, I get my nails done 💅. I checked in and shortly after, I was appointed to Melissa. She treated me very well and listened to what I wanted :) and she did just that. She was very skilled in what she did and my nails look fabulous! I wanted a design on my nails and she asked another nail designer to draw the smiley face. Gel nails are pretty pricey but it was worth the experience and how my nails looked! There are some nail salons that I have been to where the nails are crooked and the polish is not evenly distributed. I am extremely pleased with the service and my nails! If I ever find myself in Mobile, this would be my go to!

text: Very professional, clean, and awesome manicures and pedicures! They have great customer service and you can earn points to get discounts on services the more you come. They stay busy so it’s important to make an appointment but they always have a lot of times available. I recently had a gel pedicure and within a week the color changed (possibly from the sun) and they were more than happy to change the polish for free when I came back a few days later. It’s a little bit more expensive than other places but the customer service and experience is absolutely worth it!

text: Such a great place to get your nails done. The health rating is 100, and it is so gorgeous inside. The ladies that did our nails were very kind and treated us like royalty. Our manicures and pedicures were very strong.

text: I LOVE this place! I'm from Indiana on my way to Gulf Shores and needed my nails done. I googled a nail salon on my route and this one popped up. I called two weeks in advance and made an appointment for Mani/pedis and when I tell you this experience was WONDERFUL, I do mean fantastic. Top notch professionalism, kindness and even had a mimosa to pass the time. 100% recommend this place to anyone and everyone!

text: I had the best experience here. The technicians are so meticulous, and I did not feel rushed in/out. Do yourself a favor, and make an appointment. Making an appointment ensures you don’t have to wait, and simply adds to the relaxation of your experience. I will most certainly be coming back. I have nothing but positive things to say.

name: kim debose
text: The atmosphere is the best! Amy Le is very sweet and the BEST at what she does!!!! She makes your eyebrows look AMAZING!!!

name: N H
text: This was an incredibly poor experience with customer service.  I stopped in on a very slow Wednesday night as an out-of-towner, returning to New York the next morning.  There was an hour before closing and the salon was mostly empty.  I showed the girl my unpolished/natural nails (aka minimum prep required) and asked about a manicure.  She smirked at me and said they wouldn't see anyone else that evening, despite the sign on the door saying there was still an hour remaining and walk-ins were welcome.  I asked again, explaining that I was going to be flying out the next morning and she just smirked again and said they wouldn't see me and I could leave.  As I left, I noticed that they turned the 'Open' sign off.  I cannot believe this.  Hours posted exist for a reason, and this kind of poor experience in New York would shut a salon down very quickly.  I guess Alabama doesn't have enough high-quality competition, and can support this kind of nonsense from customer-supported dollars.

resp.text:
Hello, Ms. N H. Unfortunately, you came in after 6:30pm asking for double services. Our receptionist told you that all our nail technicians were already servicing the other customers and would not have gotten to you in time. Every night, we turn off our "open" at 6:30pm and you walked in after we had already turned it off. We try our best to take in everyone who walks in, especially if they come in "an hour" before we close.
I am sorry you feel that way and if you decide to give us another chance, please feel free and call to make appointment with us, to secure your spot on the book with us. We do prefer appointments because it gives us the crowd control and social distance between the customers. Thank You.

name: Johnathan Dennis
text: My first time and I can say I'd do it again! Very relaxing and professional! 👍🏽

name: Karmel Karma
text: I’ve recommended this place to several people.  They list their hours till 7pm.  But DO NOT go there after 5:30 pm.  This is the second time that they rejected customers between 5:30 and 6:15 when they weren’t even busy.  If you list your hours till 7, you plan on taking customers till 7.  Otherwise, put it in your ad that you don’t take customers after 5:30.  An out-of-town guest was dropped off there by a friend going thst way and I was to pick her up at 7 after feeding and bathing her two year old.  They wouldn’t take her  because they said it was too late.  She arrived at 6:05.  She’s now walking the two miles back.   I would never recommend these yo-yos again!

resp.text:
Hello Ms. Karmel, I am so sorry you feel that way about our hours. Our hours are from 9am-7pm, our cut off time(to stop taking in walk-ins) is at 6:30pm(with one service). We take both walk ins and appointments, but appointments are prefer due to crowd control and social distancing with our COVID-19 precautions. We will and do accept walk ins if we have available nail techs to start on you right away or with a 10-15mins wait gap.

Your friend walk in when all of our technicians were already working on their clients and would not have finished on time to start on your friend, she would have waited over an hour. Every night, we turn off our "open" sign at 6:30pm and your friend came in after we had already turned it off. If you decide to give us another chance, we recommend you calling and making an appointment first to guarantee you a spot with our nail technicians. Thank you.

text: Very understaffed on a Saturday. We waited an hour and still had not been received services.

resp.text: Hi Chelsea, our apologies for your long waiting for to be serviced as we tried our best to get to all the customers as fast as we could. However we were very busy with our appointments and could not get to you in a timely manner. If i'm not mistaken, our receptionist did mentioned to you that it would be going to be a bit of a wait? Furthermore, we couldn't rushed through our client because that is not the ideal of our business. Yes, we were understaffed because 3 of our team members were off due to personal reasons. As for a new business, it does takes time to nurture and slowly build up the team to its solid ground. We would love to have a lot more staffs, however we can't just randomly hired anybody, especially with our personal services business. If you happen to give us another try, feel free to book an appointment so that your time and service will be reserved.  Again, sorry for your experienced.

10/10 would recommend.

text: They are always so nice and definitely know what they are doing! I'm always 100% happy with my eyebrows whenever I go

name: Natalie Altman
text:
I tried this place because of all the great reviews I saw, however, I was disappointed. I gave it three stars because the place is clean and the people were friendly. Those were the only good things, though. The actual services I received (Brazilian and armpit wax) were done poorly. I still had patches(I could understand a couple strays, but not patches) of hair and I realized there was even wax still stuck to me when I got home. I was in and out in less than half an hour, which would have been great had the person actually done a good job. Seems that they were more interested in just getting it over with than doing quality work. They are the cheapest place around that I have seen and clearly, there’s a reason for that.

Edit: The owner of the business quickly messaged me with an apology and a refund. She was very kind and professional. Again, the facility was very clean and everyone was kind. Hopefully my experience was just a fluke.

name: Natasha Bodiford
text: Maddie was great. Overall experience was amazing.

name: Angela Barton
text: I am from Tampa, FL and went to a premier wax bar called Flirt. No shade to my girl back in Florida, but Kristin here at Cabana Wax is AHH-MAZING. She did my Brazilian and I feel bad for any hair that thought it stood a chance. This girl left me clean, from top to bottom. She wasn’t afraid to get in there and get any stragglers. They also use a mix of hard and soft wax which is 100% the way to go. (For those that don’t know hard wax can be used multiple times in the same area or used as a precursor for soft wax because it doesn’t adhere to skin) ANYWAYS. This girl is amazing, and the atmosphere was clean, spa-friendly, and quick. 10/10 would recommend to anyone. THANK YOU KRISTIN and see you in February :)

name: Brittany Mack
text: I want to LOVE this place so bad. As for as the process, it's hands down the best experience I have gotten here in Huntsville. Staff is friendly, attentive, and professional. The studio is clean, welcoming, and in a good location. The service is pretty fast. Im usually out in 20 mins or less and it's less painful then other places I have been to. My only concern is that for me, the hair tends to grow back wayyy faster when I go here compared to other places I've gotten serviced at. There were noticeable hair stubs all over less than a week after my wax as if I had only shaved a few days before, so I kind of felt like I wasted $50 when I could have just shaved at home which is what I'll more than likely have to do in a week anyway because it's growing so fast. The same thing occurred after my first visit as well, but because the customer service is great and the place is clean and well put together, I returned anyway. I don't know if they use a different type of wax from other places or what. When I've visited other places (before and after going to cabana for the first time), I didn't notice hair stubs until at least 2.5-3 weeks after the wax. I'd still recommend the place to others. I'll probably try the other location out next time and see if I get the same results.

text: The atmosphere was nothing like i expected, it has like a cold loft feel as opposed to a spa feel. The staff was nice but the non usage of gloves turned me off it’s just something im not used to. Also laying used wax strips near my face as opposed to the trash isnt exactly pleasant either but whatevs

resp.text: Hi, thank you for visiting our studio! We are not a spa; we’re a wax studio, and we do not advertise a spa environment :) most clients love our simple, no frills atmosphere and speedy service. It sounds like you had a facial waxing service. To be clear, our staff constantly sanitizes their hands between services (for their own protection and for that of our clients), and we have a 100 health rating from the Alabama Board of Cosmetology, which is on display in our reception area. Our technicians do not always use gloves during eyebrow wax services, because sometimes wax can get on the fingertip parts of a glove and get smudged onto parts of the brow line that are not meant to be waxed. In other words, in areas such as eyebrows where extra precision is needed to avoid removing too much hair, gloves can make the process more difficult. Gloves are always used during body waxing services. Thanks again for coming to try us out; it sounds like a traditional spa may be more your style!

text: To be honest, I was so excited for cabana to open, affordable Brazilians, convenient, and chic. I usually travel to atlanta for my Brazilians because I have been so satisfied with my visits to those waxing places. Because of my experience at cabana, I will continue to travel to Atlanta for my services. The rooms seemed unfinished with exposed ceilings and everything is stock white, which makes the time of service kind of nerve racking. The rooms are small and the beds are so rickety. I did not feel secure at all.. the structure of the studio was not designed well so when my aesthetician entered the room, my parts were facing the door... imagine someone walking by right when she opened the door... secondly, I get Brazilians about every two month.. I have never had a service where they used strips... do you know why strips aren’t used in a Brazilian? Because our skin is so sensitive, the strips are too abrasive for it. A few hours after my visit, my area broke out  in rashes and i got so irritated I had to see a doctor after because OTC cream did not help. I was rooting for cabana but because of this visit I will continue my well-worth-it commute to Atlanta.

text: This was my first Brazilian wax so I was nervous but Amber was so amazing and made the experience great. I will definitely be back!

name: Business Trans
text:
My first time coming here and I chose Bri for both me and my mom, firstly, she’s only been waxing for 5yrs, there were no gloves being used, didn’t even see her wash her hands, no wipes to wipe my face prior to waxing, i laid down on the table and she immediately began waxing, no skin analysis, no questions or conversation.

The door was open, no privacy, just a cart with hot wax, used wax globs, laying right next to the unused sticks to apply the wax

I only came here because my regular wax lady was out of town but i wont be coming back, this place is unsanitary but the receptionist was nice.

I wouldn’t recommend this place at all, I don’t believe any of these women are estheticians but whatevs.

Update: Someone from the establishment responded to my comment, obviously, very offended by MY OWN experience which no one is in control of nor will tell me to delete MY experience. You ladies need to take classes on professionalism because my comment wasn’t rude, simply MY experience. Take constructive criticism so that you can improve not to take it personally because your comment definitely doesn’t encourage me to revisit & I’m sure turns others away.

Also, it doesn’t matter what service I have, MY experience in comparison to my regular wax lady, who’s a licensed esthetician for 20yrs, to your staff of 5yrs, is a joke. You’re unsanitary & I stand behind MY experience.

resp.text: Thank you for trying out our studio. I want to address a few of your comments. First, she’s only been waxing for 5 years? That’s quite a while (and Bri is very experienced), so I’m not sure what you were expecting as far as years of experience. Second, there is no need for a formal “skin analysis” in the room; that’s why we have you fill out a form in reception where we ask, among other things, whether you have used retinol, Accutane, alpha hydroxy acids, etc. in the area(s) to be waxed and whether you’ve ever had a bad reaction to waxing. Even without a formal skin analysis as you call it, our technicians are analyzing your skin during the service and would immediately stop the service if there were any issues. Third, everyone who waxes at Cabana Wax has a current cosmetology or esthetics license, which is what the Alabama State Board of Cosmetology requires. The Board actually visited us a few weeks ago for our 2019 unannounced inspection (we got a 100), and licensure and cleanliness are the two main things they inspect. Your irresponsible comment about licensure insinuates that we are violating the law, which is slanderous, and I encourage you to remove it immediately. Finally, you had a chin wax; the technicians would never leave the treatment room door ajar for a Brazilian wax or any other intimate service. Thanks again for your business.

text: The girls at the front desk lack customer service skills, the person who done my wax was alright. However this has been the worst Brazilian that I’ve ever had in my life. The most I’ve ever had from being waxed has been TWO total over the past 7 months, with this most recent wax I’ve literally (not even near joking) have had over 17. One of which I had to be placed on medication because it became abcessed.

resp.text: Jessica, we just called you to try to discuss the experience you have described in this review but were unable to reach you. I’m very sorry you have had ingrown hairs since your wax. We see you had an appointment in March but have not heard from you since then. We would have offered assistance with the ingrowns if we had known you were having a problem, but this is the first time we’re ever hearing about your experience, almost two months after the fact. We would sincerely love to help, but we cannot if we don’t know there’s a problem. Please call if there’s anything we can do to help you! We would love to do so. Thanks :)

name: Sarah Hansen
text: I’ve been seeing Hannah at Glitter and Moss regularly for the past six months, and I can honestly say it is hands down the best investment I’ve ever made for myself. Hannah is friendly and so knowledgeable. From the way she talks you through your treatments, you can tell she knows her stuff and that she is truly passionate about skincare. While her services are absolutely relaxing (hot towels, yes please!), they go so far beyond that to truly treat your skin in ways that will noticeably improve your complexion. I came to Hannah specifically wanting to target issues I have with acne around my jawline, but the changes I’ve noticed in my skin go so far beyond that. Between my monthly treatments with Hannah and the home care regimen she’s recommended to me, we’ve fixed issues with my skin that I didn’t even realize I had. I’ve gotten multiple compliments on the natural glow I seem to have now, and I owe it all to Hannah. She is truly the best, and I can’t recommend booking an appointment at Glitter and Moss highly enough!

resp.text: Sarah, thank you so much for taking the time to review G&M. We appreciate you soooo much! Thank you so much for being a part of this little business 💕

She is passionate about everyone achieving healthy skin and feeling confident in their skin. A truly priceless gift. I will be a client for life!

They repeated that she no longer worked there.  Sooo, then I used Ivy 3 times. Guess what? Ivy's gone. When I went this last time, some guy who I've never seen before did my nails. I got them done yesterday
(fill-in), and am going to have to go tomorrow to have a new one put on because he filed it so narrow that it's gonna break at any time.  I'm a pretty patient and reasonable person, but this time it is ME who will be gone. I will go anywhere tomorrow except this place. I will NEVER recommend this place to anyone!

(I get gel everytime) Then while filing my nails he wasn't paying attention and was actually filing my skin on several nails. Then while clipping them, he gouged my nail bed and the underside of several nails again. He was extremely rough. I have never said ouch or complained but he hurt me and made me bleed. I finally just said to stop that I was done and thank you but no thank you. He asked me why and I explained to him that he was too rough and no other technician complains when I come about my feet being so tiny and I get gel everytime.
