name: Lucasta Jones
text: I've been coming here for 5 times and they are by far the best nail salon in the area.My tech is absolutely amazing!! She truly understands what I want (shape and color wise).

name: Jasmine Wiley
text: I simply needed a fill in . The nail tech misshaped my nails to a complete different shape that doesn’t exist. After explaining I just needed coffin shape. Maybe it was a language barrier but I was still charged full price even when I asked her not to complete the service. No one offered to fix the problem.  Only nails salon charging extra 20.00 for gel polish. So basically i was charged 90.00 for a pedicure since that was the only thing done successfully. They also use their nail drills on the highest speed . Be prepared for sore nail beds!

name: Helena Wilson
text: This is my regular go-to spot. They do a good job, and the prices are good too. The technician removed my previous hard gel and gave me a beautiful manicure. Shaping was done perfectly and she took her time. Will definitely return.

name: Nina Allen (Nina Jackson Allen)
text: Excellent.  Ask foe Lina or Nancy!!

name: Nasa Trần Dung
text: There were a couple of regulars who walked in while I was there that were greeted by name, so that made me feel more confident in choosing to come here for my first time. Very clean and friendly. I'll definitely be back!

name: jalisa jordan
text: I received a pedicure and gel polish on my nails.  I had to touch up my feet in the shower the same night.  The pedicure wasn’t done well at all.  The gel on my nails is peeling off .  It hasn’t even been a week.  For the price, I expected better .  There’s an extra $5 charge for each service , due to covid .  That’s fine, but with all the money I spent, again, I expected better.

name: Amanda Walker
text: Not satisfied at all first they didn't understand what I wanted kept asking me to get gel polish instead of regular and kept insisting I get a different shape than coffin why they wouldn't just do them like I was asking instead of insisting on doing them other than what I was asking for idka nd did not know how to do coffin shape evidently cause I had to come home and fix them some nails were alot shorter than others just not a good experience at all and i normally pay about 33 or 34$ for a full set regular polish and polish toes i was charged 60$ i will not be going back

name: Tim Horton's
text: Clean place friendly employees. They really try to give you the nail design you want to have. I got my first ombré powder done here and it looks amazing. I would definitely come back and I highly recommend it.

name: Imelda James
text: This place is the best! They are so honest when it comes to nail techniques and what is best for their clients. I always get the SNS and some other nail salons make it too thin, too thick, too wide, etc. but not this place! Perfect every time :) and they take their time with you as well so you never have to feel rushed. Thank you!

name: Raven Blackwood
text: Absolutely amazing!! took their time and gave me exactly what I wanted. Will be returning, and definitely recommending to everyone I see!!

name: Scarlett Wellman
text: Love, love , love Lina and her team! I am never disappointed with their work.

name: JB
text: Would give 0 stars if possible. Very shady, tried to claim gift certificate was worth half the written value. Beware

name: Vargas Nicol
text: Best nail salon!!! CLEAN, friendly, and consistent staff, lots of polish choices. The absolute best spot in the area. I will be back.

name: Dangie A Turner
text: Loved this place & the staff was super friendly. Pearl pedicure was amazing!

name: Trini Doll Nicky 2021
text: My GEL NAIL polish started to peel off within only 2 days after getting service. That's my only complaint. Wendy was my nail technician. She was kind and courteous. The staff was professional. But my nails looked horrible after only a couple of days and I tipped $20 and paid good money. So of course I was disappointed.

name: Danny Ali
text: I recently moved to this place and have been searching for a good nail salon that has good customer service.  I've tried 3 other places and was not impressed at all.  And this salon is excellent!  I just went for the first time this week and manicurist took care of my feet.  It was heavenly.  The pedicure was great. I look forward to going back again and again.

name: Imelda Jones
text: I've already recommended two of my friends and they have enjoyed their experiences there.  I continue to go with a friend every couple months as a fun treat/hangout for us. I like these technicians! They were detailed, thorough, gentle and communicated well with getting our approvals of the color, shape etc. I think we will request them when we go again.

name: Sheila Murphy
text: I had heard good things about this place, but my experience was not good at all. I even contacted the owner about my experience and she was not helpful at all and took over a week to respond to me. I got a mani/pedi and was so disappointed. It was painful, the lady didnt understand what I was telling her, the polish looked so very bad and I removed it as soon as I got home.

name: Leslie Kerr
text: I’m extremely disappointed in the service received. I specially told the technician NO extension/tip for my teenage daughter. She didn’t listen and added tips despite the conversation.

name: Emily Mark
text: Love this place - super friendly. Lina did my pedicure but it was the best pedicure and foot massage that I've received from a nail salon. I definitely recommend this salon!!

name: Flores Dominique
text: Another great mani from manicurist did an awesome job on my Pedi. Manicurist also talked me into a facial, which I desperately needed so it didn't take too much persuading. It was great, so I'll go back for one another time for sure. Thanks, I will be back!!

name: Kendra Creamer
text: Always greeted when I walk-in. Rarely have to wait for a chair. If you make an appointment you get in within  minutes of arrival, even when they are busy. Staff is always courteous and they do great work. Waxing always looks great too. I never go anywhere else.

name: Stephany Nitza
text: I love this place and had such a great first impression. I got a full set with the dipping powder. I was amazed. It is very clean and the nail techs are very professional. Barely even any wait time either. Wendy did my nails and I will be back to see her again.

name: ashli Jennings
text: Very clean. Great experience!!

name: Gladys R. Rutledge
text: Another wonderful pedicure at Madison Nails & Spa. One thing that i love about this place is they bring out a clean box of tools for each customer unlike some other nail places that just wipe tools off with rubbing alcohol. Technician wasn't rushed and did a great job. Hot cream and massage is heavenly!

name: K. Hankins Heidi
text: I've had my gel nails on for about a week now and they still look good. Also the ladies there make you feel comfortable and welcomed. Glad I was introduced to this palace.

name: dimaris griggs
text: I love this place. they are always friendly professional and prompt. if the wait is going to take long they will always reschedule you. they will not waist your time. I am always satisfied with the way my nail look after the service. I highly recommend them. check them out. you will not be disappointed

name: Chalisse LeMaitre-Layman
text: They always make you feel welcomed, not rushed. They listen to what you want, and they are the best with children when you have to take your lil one with you. I am extremely happy that they had been recommended to me.

name: Puggy Paul
text: The Manager was very rude when after being 40 minutes past my appointment acted like she could care less. I'm sure the nail techs are great but the manager is very unprofessional and a jerk.

name: Amanda Mary
text: I have been going to Madison Nails & Spa now for quite some time. The shop is clean, friendly and all the people do a wonderful job. My technician is meticulous. I had trouble finding a really good nail shop until now.

name: Michael Williams
text: I have been getting my nails done at this place for half a year and do not plan to go anywhere else. I live 30 mns away from Madison and this is honestly my favorite place to get my nails done. They are very nice and friendly! They know how to treat their customers! I recommended this nail salon to my friend and they were satisfied with their experience!!

name: Billyjoe lopez
text: Never disappointed in this place I drive 30 minutes out of my way in order to go here because their work is that good I'll never go anywhere else

name: Aya Khatib
text: Lina is the sweetest, kind hearted, most passionate lady! She listens to what you want takes her time and is very detailed with all her work. A PERFECTIONIST AT ITS BEST!!! All the beauty’s that work here are great, friendly and extremely knowledgeable and professional. This is the place to go not only for your nails but she also does micro blading and let me just say I am in love with my eyebrows!!!

name: Evelyn Martin
text: Do yourself a favor and go to Madison Nails & Spa. Staff are AMAZING. I have been getting my nails done for years and this is the real deal. From the friendly service to the overall asethetic it's the best experience you can receive!

name: Amanda D
text: I always have such a good experience with Wendy. She always makes it such a treat to have my nails done. I've been going to her for about 4 years and couldn't ask for a better nail tech. She does a fantastic job and is always extremely professional and friendly. Lena, the owner provides an wonderful relaxing environment. Appointments are honored and rarely run past but you must come on time because the techs are busy with clients all day. Wouldn't go anywhere else.

resp.text: Thank you for your comment and your business. Hope you and your family have a wonderful holiday!!!

name: Anjali White
text: This is the best nail salon in Madison hands down. I just wish they did acrylics because I know they would do them expertly. They really are perfectionist which is hard to find in a nail salon. I just wish they were closet to my apartment

name: staham jackson
text: My first time visiting there I got the best pedicure I have ever had in my life along with a wonderful foot massage. Their techniques are modern and the salon was extremely clean. Their prices are competitively priced compared to other salons who were not as professional. I plan to go back for a fill in soon.

name: junk mail
text:
This nail salon is the absolute best! Even though they are busy, they are always very polite and have beautiful smiles for everyone. Wendy is awesome at what she does and she has always done a great job for me and my friends.
100% Satisfaction at Madison Nails and Spa.
100% Happiness with Wendy and her beautiful art.
100% Amazed at how Lina runs her business better than any Nail Salon I've seen!

name: Patrick Olivia
text: My first trip here was excellent! I got the most thorough mani/pedi I've ever had. They also managed to some how make my terrible feet soft. So many colors to choose from and they do nail art. Excited to go back!

name: John Pierson
text: The Pedicure was great.  The technician, Amy, was very professional and welcome me.  I highly recommend this shop.

name: Angela Dennis
text: Had microbladding done.  She did such an awesome job!!! It was my first time so I was a little nervous but she made me feel very comfortable.   Great experience and would definitively recommend. Love it

name: Jodi Biegel
text: This salon seemed a little pricey, but they do great quality work! The price in the end is worth it!

name: Brittany M
text: Went last week for dip nails. One, they dipped my nails directly into the powder which is unsanitary. Second the gentleman who did my nails clearly did not know what he was doing. I had to ask him after he thought he was done to make my nails smoother and less bulky. I was so unsatisfied after 2 hrs of being there I gave up, paid and left. Went back a few days later because my nails were lifting... ALREADY! Why go back? Cause I had to match the color. A new person did my nails and did a complete different method than the first guy. The nail ended up being completely different from the rest of my nails. I also had to ask her to go in and make my nails less bulky after she thought she was finished. Beware who you let do your nails there if you are getting tips and doing dip. I gave them 2 stars only because the facility is very clean and nice.

resp.text: Sorry, your not happy. But as every story there is always to sides to a story. I went back to see when you visited us last and see you came in 12 days ago. After 12 days no color will be the same. So when the technician did your nails with the same powder the color was off. In most salons you would have paid full price after 12 days. I do apologize for your bad service.

name: Julie C Smith
text: This group of people are Awesome! They have always done an excellent job on my pedicures and nails! Very clean place. They also did my microblading it looks so awesome. It looks just like hair. I am so happy with the job Lina did on my eyebrows. I would recommend any services you need done. Thanks guys for the great work you do!

name: Theresa Leonard
text: Call this morning got a appointment with Wendy for 2:00. She got me in and out. Love my nails

name: Mary Ann Ketron
text: Thank you Wendy for always making my nails look beautiful! I prefer a natural look and Wendy knows the perfect combination of powders to get the look I want. Thank you for always making me a quick appointment around my busy schedule. I look forward to  our time together!

name: Ms Ken
text: Awesome service! My nails look phenomenal! Just what I asked for

name: connie garcia
text: I’ve been here a few times, and each time I get the feeling that I’m not welcomed. Some employees do a great job but others seem in a hurry . The only nice one is Wendy and the owner.

name: Grace
text:
It took two and a half hours for a manipedi after they assured me it would be ‘about an hour.’

I got a great pedicure but the woman who did my manicure was rough and impatient. She told me repeatedly to relax my hands (which I’m pretty sure I was doing) and when I didn’t do it the way she wanted, she twisted my fingers uncomfortably while expressing her annoyance. The end result was a mediocre manicure.

This salon is a gamble. Can sometimes be great, can sometimes be pretty bad.

name: Alicia Hall
text: This is a very clean and well kept salon.  My services have mostly been good but some inconsistency in the quality at times.

name: Jessica Burgess
text:
I honestly enjoy my experience at the Madison Nails and Spa as I was a new customer. However, I didn’t fairly enjoy how rude customers were treating the nail technicians. On Saturday, I came in to get my nails done and notice how rudely one customer was treating one of the nail technicians, Nancy. This lady was criticizing and complaining on why she didn’t want to speak English and started to act very poorly to her.
First off, I need to state off that customers really need to stop treating these workers like they are machines. Sometimes they have rough days and they can’t do as well as they used to be. These people have families of their own and can’t spend all their time working on one little piece of your nails. I honestly don’t know how anyone could have the right mind to treat someone like this. These nail technicians has lives. They might not be as fortunate as others with well paying and easy jobs. Customers can’t treat these people like they have no value other than painting nails. And sometimes these nail technicians don’t even get enough sleep or rest, and have off days. And all these negative reviews on this nail salon makes me sick. You don’t know how it feels to make a business just to have people talk trash and negativity about it. Weren’t you people taught on how to react others the way you wanted to be treated?

name: Maria Battle
text: It was okay. My pedicure was nice, just a bit over priced.

name: L.T. Stallworth
text:
Beware. Definitely stay away from the old guy if you want dip nails. He is horrible. My nails are too big for my fingers, clumpy and thick plus he was too rough. Also, the color palate is off. I choosed a gold color dip powder and it turned out olive green. Before I even got a chance to voice my grievances, I noticed I was missing my wallet. But had my checkbook in my purse. Long story short, the owner didnt know what too do saying she wont take checks! Tried to send me to the bank with someone tailing me like they would miraculously allow me to get money out with no ID. I had to leave my phone just to go all the way back home, in order to come back and provide her with payment. I did apologize for not having the proper form of payment, then offered advice  that she should take cash app, google or apple pay, pay pal or something if this should ever happen again because she made me feel some type of way about the situation with her rudeness and lack of understanding, and for this reason I would not be returning. She basically told that was my problem. Clearly it was an "our" problem because I couldn't pay for her service at the time, right. I cant and wont ever support a business who can't respect their clientele and provide a decent service along with customer service. As well as the right to refuse service to anyone sign hanging in their establishment. Who and why would you refuse service to anyone I wonder? I'll tell you who, anyone with an opinion, just like I told old dude the color was off on my nails and the shape and he got an attitude about it, then became rough stating I wasnt hold my hand properly. 1 star is 1 too many in my opinion. Needless to say. I will be going across town in the morning to correct this disaster.
P.S. excuse all the typos, my fingers are sore from the roughness of old dude rubbing dipping powder off with a rough dry towel.

name: Kaeti Milton
text: The staff provides excellent customer service and quality work. The atmosphere of the facility is relaxing and pleasant. Also, it's comforting knowing that all of the equipment used for different services is clean and sanitary. I've noticed that the health score of the salon has been 100 consistently every time that I've been there. I would never use another salon than this location.

name: Andrea Nall
text: I love my nail salon.  Its very clean and the staff is friendly.  They have convenient hours.  They offer many different services and options.  Fair prices as well.

name: Paula Taylor
text: SERVICE IS ALWAYS EXCELLENT!!!! Shout out to Wendy👍🏼... Greatest Nail Technician Ever! 😊

name: PAULA TAYLOR
text:
Shout Out to Madison Nails, and Especially my Favorite And Most Dependable Nail Professional, Ms. Wendy.... I’ve been with her for over 7 Years, the service provided has been SUPERB!  I highly recommend Wendy, you will be definitely satisfied.
Thank you Wendy.

name: Datrean Pileggi
text: They were very good, attentive, and kind in the beginning. I’ve been coming here for about 18 months. I made ONE (my first) complaint about my nails a few months back and they’ve been rude and dismissive ever since. Just today I came back to try again. I asked for a pedi and full set and they waited until my pedicure was done to tell me that no one was available FOR THE REST OF THE DAY to do my nails. It was 1pm on a random Wednesday... Never coming back

name: Trevor Holt
text: Amazing service!! Fast friendly and they pay attention to detail. I noticed that everything was kept very clean which is a huge plus and the environment is relaxed so you don’t feel out of place as a first time customer. No doubt I’ll be back and would not hesitate to recommend to anyone!

name: Savannah Brooks
text: Today was my first time visiting this nail salon and i will definitively be a regular! I got a pedicure and gel manicure and the experience was great and so relaxing! They use disposable nail files and sponges (all salons are supposed to but salons don’t always follow this rule I’ve noticed) and they had the perfect matching color for the gel polish on my nails and regular polish on my toes.

name: Carla Lester
text: Had microblading done here! The whole experience really couldn’t have gone better. Everything was so professional and amazingly sterile. Almost hospital like. Although really nervous about the procedure and the final result beforehand, I have nothing but good things to say after having it done. The results were great; very natural just as requested. Discomfort was minimal and the healing and care process was explained in depth in order to achieve the best results!  Definitely recommend!!

name: Jenna Vasquez
text:
I came in last week with my mom , daughter and i for a fun time pedi . The boss , and two other females talked about our toe nails and my finger nails the entire time ,and made fun of them , laughing and pointing showing of my nails to the boss .i didn’t want to get filled at their store on that day . that was the most disrespectful and rude thing to do to paying customers $75 +tips and just to be insulted!, NO!
yet each one got a tip but i did tell my lady
how rude the three of them were so i’m leaving this review! unsatisfied

name: Vanessa Wilson
text: They people here don't give the same level of service to walk-ins vs regular clients.  I was at Batteries plus and decided to go in for a quick polish change and brow wax.  My brows were too thin and had spaces.  My polish didn't have enough coats.  I won't be back.

resp.text: I'm sorry but we are not located next to Batteries plus. But if you did get your Nails done at Madison Nails & Spa we apologize you did not have a good experience. We pride ourselves on great service.

name: Kelly McGuffin
text: The experience I had was terrible!!!  The guy that did my nails acted like he was in a race to get my nails done.  He didn't file my nails and I had pieces hanging off the side.  I asked him to fix it and he painted it to the side of my nail.  Other nails look terrible.  He was very rough and didn't care.  My fingers were red and almost bleeding.  I wouldn't dare go there again.

name: Patricia Wyenandt
text: I've been coming to this salon for more than 3 years.  Everyone is greeted immediately.  I have never seen anyone have to wait more than 15 minutes.  Lina, the owner does my nails.  She does a great job and works with me to create interesting color combinations and designs.  All of the technicians are good.  Everything is sterilized and the tools are prepackaged for each client.  Their health rating is a consistent 100.  I recommend so many people to come here.

name: Timothy Corey
text: Tammy (my wife) has had nothing less than excellent service from Lena and her staff. My wife has very high standards and has been to many salons all over the world. For her to want to write a review is very rare. Every APPOINTMENT has been kept and EVERY crazy idea my wife has for her salon care has been taken care of with the highest professional care. Thank you Lena and your staff.

name: Ilona Allen
text: Best place ever, sweet and kind and do a great job

name: Lanita Parker
text: I have been here several times. My sister had given me a Gift card for Christmas in 2017. I also had another one that was not dated. I usually wait until spring to have my pedicures done. I forgot about the gift cards last year and went and paid cash for my services. I ran across the gift certificates and decided to take my sister to get manicures and pedicures done today. We checked to be sure we could still use them since I know one had expired. They said yes and said that the price had gone up and we would have to pay the extra cost. Of course I had no problem with that. We were both going to upgrade our pedicures to a more expensive service. We had picked out our colors and they had directed us to our chairs. They had already started removing my toenail polish when the same lady that initially told us we could use the gift certificates said that one had expired. My sister decided she wouldn’t have anything done if they were not willing to honor the amount that had already been purchased. Then they said mine had also expired because it had their old location listed. We both left. My sister and I both, along with 2 of her daughters used them exclusively for all our pedicures. I feel they could have made some kind of arrangement with us. It’s not like we clipped a coupon that expired. These were bought gift certificates and we were planning to spend more money above their value. They lost lots of future business today because I won’t be back!

resp.text: Sorry! We can’t take gift certificate has been expired in 2years.

name: ashley harbin
text: First I never write reviews but This place is Great, they keep the store very clean, they take their time, and the staff are extremely nice and professional. I love my nails and will be a returning customer. Lee and Wendy were great!

name: Martha Newman
text: This place is so nice!! Super clean, courteous staff and they go above and beyond to make you comfortable. They do an amazing job with manicures and pedicures!! I will never go anywhere else!

name: Aaliyiah Swoopes
text: I hardly EVER post reviews but the way I was treated today was absolutely ridiculous! Poor customer service has been the most memorable experiences that this place has to offer. WENDY & LINA we’re both very rude with nasty attitudes when I stated a problem about my tips for a full set being cut too short. When I was told I am being “too picky” it blew me!!! As far as I’m concerned, my requests should be made bc that is what I am paying you for! After reading other reviews (to see if I’m the only person that experienced this) it seems like regular customers are treated like precious saints compared to walk-in clients. I will not be coming back or referring business to this place! OAN Train your nail techs accommodate clients instead of making excuses for mediocre service 😒

resp.text: Sorry for your experience. All our staff been take care but you wasn’t happy with anyone. Sorry we can’t please you.

name: Denise Mack
text:
I have been going to this shop for about four
Years and the service is great!  If the wait is longer that 15 minutes, you are advised before you sit.
You are provided water, kids juice box if requested.  Technicians are polite.  Love the atmosphere.
I have gone to a few other shops and always run back here.  Very professional.  D

name: LaShawn Jackson
text: Madison Nails & Spa offers excellent service. I’m very particular about my nails and pedicure. I’ve been going to Lina for over 2 years now. The customer service is awesome. They have many nail colors, keep up with the latest nail trends and offer a variety of other services (wax etc). My preference is the SNS dip powder which keeps my natural nails strong and healthy. I would advise you to make an appointment because the new location is conveniently located and the walk-in traffic is high. An appointment will put you ahead of the walk-ins.

name: Cinda Feagan
text:
Please be aware because I returned due to the nail polish being lumpy after day one of having  them done. I returned the following day to show Nancy the tech and she was extremely rude!  She shook her finger as if I was a child and told me what she felt would be best for my nails after I told her repeatedly that I only want gel not powder. She pouted like a child the entire time she was removing the gel. I always tip and now I want everyone to know once you return if serviced by Nancy she pretend like she cannot understand English.  Trust me they all speak English but use it to their advantage when they do not want to honor quality service.

Consider this as a warning!  I will never return to this salon!!!

resp.text: I’m sorry for your bad experience. We have professional nail technicians that always refer you to the best service. You chose your own technician to take care your nails and you walk out without paying or telling the technician Thank you. Thank you for your comments and your business.

name: Reya Patel
text: I am very disappointed in the lack of service they give here. I've heard great things about this place from friends. However I did not get that. I wait over 50mins before someone even acknowledged me. The work they do is great. They did a really good job on my nails. They customer service skills did not match my expectation.

name: Tabetha Bell
text: I  am from out of town. I was worried about finding good service. Maddison Nails & Spa went above and beyond to satisfy my needs. I highly recommend.

name: Sandra Brooks
text: My daughter came in for prom nails and picked out a color to match her dress.  The nails come out a very different color.  They were no help in making things right.

name: Sarah May
text:
I haven’t been to the spa a lot but I have heard from my friends that the owner is very rude most of the time they have been there. I in no way try to be rude but I can say myself she gives off a vibe to me personally, or like gives an attitude. She also treats people with appointments better than walk ins and it gets on my nerves most of the time because some walk in people could be waiting for like 3 hours and the owner would decide to do the person who could show up to an appointment late. She doesn’t show much respect or attention to “walk in”customers. Just in my opinion, I hate that, like it’s the vibe she gives off that she doesn’t care about most of her customers.

If you are a new time customer though, and you want to have a good experience, I recommend either Wendy or Nancy. I just wanted to share some of my friends and I experience after going to this nail shop.

I am not trying to offend the owner, I’m just trying to share my opinion.

name: kaiya mcghaw
text: Amazing service! And quality is always top notch! Definitely recommend.

name: diane korb
text:
Lina's attention to detail is awesome! She does a great job on my nails!
I will not go anywhere else!

name: Quiona Edwards
text: I usually don’t leave bad reviews even if I receive bad service. However, today’s visit was horrible! Wendy usually does my nails and 8/10 times she gets it right. I’m not sure if she was just having a bad day today but she was EXTREMELY rude and not helpful. Oh and my nails look bad already. Hasn’t even been 12 hours!

name: Tiffany Myers
text: Always recieve excellent service! Highly recommended!!  I see Amy and she's amazing!

name: Katrinia ktrinia
text:
This place DESREVES a NEGATIVE STAR.
One Star is too good for it.
My daughter went to this shop.
She has small petite hands.
The nails the placed on her hands are way too big. I called and asked for the manager. To have them redone. "LINA" said there was no manager there. I asked could we come back in the morning She said NO. 5PM instead. I asked for the managers name so that I could speak about getting them done earlier. Then this Person said She was the manager. SMDH now. ( So shes a liar too) She said I was being loud and nasty to her. When in fact I wasnt. The service is Trash. The nails are Trash, polish lumpy . I will be sure to advise others not to go here. Here's a little advice for this business. When you work in service. KNOW your place. It's to serve. Lina

resp.text: Thank you for your comments. First when you asked for the manager I told you on the phone “how may i help you”. I never said I was not the manager. English is not not my first language so maybe I was unclear. You then started to rasie your voice when requesting your daughters nails need to be fixed. I told you we have time for the repair tonight and you rufused that time. I then told you we were booked and the first available time for the repair was 5 pm tomorrow. Once again thank you for you comments and wish you the best of luck.

name: Amanda Goeke
text:
If you're going into the salon I recommend a pedicure over a manicure. My pedicure has lasted for over two weeks and the massage treatment I got was heavenly.
I did get a shellac manicure or and it barely lasted a week before the tips began wearing off. I get shellac because I am constantly washing my hands as a teacher, and having it we are off within a single week was a bit annoying.

name: Susan Mitchell
text: Very beautiful and clean interior, excellent staff and a very relaxing environment.  I highly recommend.

name: Faith Thornton
text: My name is Faith Thornton and I have personally known Lina and her family for 11 years. She has done my nails for years, starting back when their shop was in Wal-mart. She is a perfectionist, goes to school and classes to learn the latest tricks of her trade. She takes responsibility for her salon and for her employees. All of her employees are nice and respectful. They all do a fabulous job. Lina will recommend a product because she knows what is best for the client. She recommended the SNS powder and I will never use anything else. It does not chip or fade, it makes brittle nails like mine strong and helps them grow. I no longer have to get fake nails because of this amazing product and because of the knowledgeable people who work here. This is the place to get your mani’s, pedi’s, waxing, nails, and a variety of other services. They are AWESOME!!!!💜

text: I've never found a nail salon I wanted to go back to a second time or more. But, I love it here because the people are personable and friendly. It's also reasonably priced. They do an amazing job! They take their time and do it right no matter how busy they are! I had a male both times and they have been the best nails I've ever gotten done! They do have women in there as well I just haven't experienced them doing my nails yet because I've only been there twice so far but, I will definitely be going back! You don't have some glob of acrylic with your nails so thick that you can't do anything. They look so natural that I actually had people asking me if they were my "real" nails! While I was sitting there the second time I came back, almost every person that came in was remembered, asked about details that were happening in their family's lives,  (ex-is your husband feeling well now, one lady came in and was asked how her daughter's leg was doing) I'm not sure what happened but just that they remember and make you feel important speaks volumes! It is very quiet in there is the only downfall there's no background music going. They have movies on screen but no sound with them and that's really the only complaint that I have! Overall it was a great experience and I would definitely go back over and over again!

name: Amber Griffith
text:
As a first time customer, I was disappointed by my experience.

The staff were rude, dismissing, and "pushy".

I wished to view my options for manicure and pedicure - spa, basic, gel, acrylic, etc. One technician greeted me as I entered and assumed what services I required. I had to forcefully repeat I wanted to inquire about services and today only required a gel polish manicure.

Simple, eh?

I was ushered into the back to sit in a pedicure chair and was TOLD that I wanted a pedicure. Again, I repeated my request for gel manicure only (and after 15 minutes) was seated at a front chair. The technician who initiated contact complained about my request to the client he was servicing and to fellow coworkers.

Not only did I feel demoralized but, embarrassed for choosing this establishment to complete a simple manicure. 20 minutes later another technician finally came over to inquire about my gel color. Still, over 35 minutes after entering the salon and being seated - they have yet to begin.

The salon is not booked to capacity nor is there a wait.

I was simply ignored numerous times.

I will never enter this establishment again. Nor will I recommend to fellow patrons.

name: Elise Turner
text: I never give bad reviews. This will be a first for me. I’ve gone to this nail salon a hand full of times and each time my nails do not last. They chip easy and the workers have no people skills. This last time I went I got acrylics and matte black nail polish first my nail polish cracked the day after on at least half of my nails from where they over applied. And now two just popped off as if they were weeks old, I wasn’t doing anything to cause them to come off (I’ve had them for 6 days). And to top it off while I was sitting getting my nails done a lady came in and showed them her nails where she had got matte green and they were just pilling off and The manager was talking to the guy she said did them and he admitted he didn’t know how to do matte and they still made her pay to fix them. Save your money. I wish I would have saved my $65

text: Most unprofessional and inconsiderate doctor's office I have ever come in contact with in my life.  Made 1st appointment, drove an hour to get there and they had no record of my appointment (after giving me directions as to how to get there) once I arrived.  Made a 2nd appointment; they called and changed my time which I explained would push me to get there, was told if I were a few minutes late that it would be okay.  Called them on my way to tell them that there was a car accident on the interstate and that I would probably be 10 minutes late and was told that the doctor would not see me.  Another hour drive for nothing.  They were rude on the phone and actually hung up on me refusing to let me talk to the owner or the practicing doctor.  I will be reporting this place to the Better Business Bureau and will be reporting the doctor as well.  They are a joke!!!!

text:
$25 for a day pass.  The guy who checked me in was useless.  Collected my money and said ok, you can go back.  No tour, no explaining where everything was...nothing.  It’s rather small so I was able to figure out the lockers and get into my robe rather quickly and head straight for the steam room.

Surprise, the steam room is broken down.  That sucks, but I could still do the sauna and whirlpool.  Wrong, sauna is broken too.  So all you get for your $25 is a whirlpool, and a lounge that has cartoons blasting loudly on the TV for some reason.

I am usually one to just write off a bad experience and say lesson learned but I did go back out front and talk to the girl at the desk.  She was very apologetic and said they should have told me about the steam room, and she had no idea that the sauna was broken.  She refunded my money and I left.

It has potential but this place is terrible right now.

This is a beautiful decorated salon with all the latest and greatest salon equipment. My daughter and son-in-law also go to this salon and use Molly. They can do your eyebrows while your there or you can book an appt with their massage therapist who also has a variety of choices to meet anyone's needs and prices are equal to the standard salon prices in our area.

name: Ethan Rayhorn
text: I made an online appointment for the same day and it was confirmed within 5 minutes. I got a 90 minute deep tissue and hot stone massage and it was wonderful. You get a FULL 90 minutes. There was a variety of techniques that I hadn't experienced before and it worked amazingly well on my sore back and shoulders. I love that they are open late too, so I can come in after work. The prices are very fair, and I will not hesitate to come back! Most importantly, I felt like the facility was clean. They wore masks, cleaned the table and headrest with alcohol, changed the sheets and washed their hands. They ask you to wear a mask when face-up on the table. I would want a massage therapist to be clean any time, but especially with covid, it was nice to see that they were doing things right. They also had their alabama LMT licenses at the front counter which is always nice to see when going to a new place and wanting to make sure it is legitimate.

name: C Bella
text:
Ashley is my wax specialist at the Birmingham location and she's amazing.  She's been doing my wax for about 5-6 months.  She does a great job and is super friendly and professional.  Highly recommend her and EWC.
I've been a customer of EWC since around 2016/2017 when I moved to the Gulf Coast area and had to find a new wax place since I had previously used a locally owned wax spa in Birmingham.  While living on the Gulf Coast, I patronized the New Orleans, LA, Diberville, MS, and Slidell, LA EWC locations.
The Slidell, LA and Birmingham locations are the best locations of the four I've tried.  I've been getting a full Brazilian bikini wax for 10-11 years now so I know a great wax specialist when I find one...And if you're wondering, yes, I have a wax pass.  Applicable service: Full Brazilian Bikini Wax.

name: Danesha Clarke
text:
I booked a Saturday appointment with European Wax Center on Thursday. In order to travel I need a Covid test which was also booked for Saturday.
I got tested that morning but waiting on the results was going to make the appointment difficult to make. Realizing this, I called to ask if the time could be pushed back; they were booked and said it could not be changed.
We got the results in enough time for me to make the appointment. I called to say that I was on my way and the person on the phone told me the waxer was uncomfortable waxing me.
I let her know that the covid test was a requirement for travel and I had not been in contact with anyone with covid and already received the negative result.

She then said they usually don't come back that quickly, and would have to reschedule.

I understand taking precautions, but I had just recieved a negative result. It's also likely that persons with Covid-19 are actively patronizing their location.
However,  because they were aware that I took the test I was unable to go to my appointment. Very disappointing.

name: Shakiyah Sherrod
text: I set up an appointment for both me and my sister. That process was great I received a call the day of to tell me that the first person we were scheduled to see had canceled but that was no problem because they set me up with Someone else. Then as I’m driving from a long distance from where I stay. I received a call saying that the other person we were scheduled with could not do it and if we did come they could try and if she was to do it she could only do one. But overall it’s not guaranteed. So I go into the center to cancel the appointment since I was already in the area to and the receptionist made no eye contact or let me know that everything was canceled. I had to ask her was it completed. She didn’t even say have a good day. She was a black girl with short hair. We stay about 45 minutes away and came together. The appointments was at 2:30 and 3:00. We are first time guest and We will not be coming back.

text: I loved this place. 100% recommend. The customer service was amazing. I went in for my first Brazilian wax ever. I had a girl named Amaryllis, she was so amazing. text: Terrible wax job! I could have done a better job shaving at home. I have patches where hair is still very visible and I have leftover wax in front and back crevices. Not a good experience at all. My first and last time coming here!!!!

resp.text: Alicea Powell, we regret to hear that you had a negative experience with us, but would appreciate the chance to turn your experience around.  We do offer complimentary touch up services...not sure if you called and talked with us directly.  If you are willing to give us another chance, please reach out to us at (205) 637-3201 to speak to our manager directly. Thank you again for taking the time to let us know how we can improve. We hope you will consider us again in the future. Take care.

name: Rachel Kim - Realtor
text: Today was my first time to get a wax... and a Brazilian at that! Etoria did a great job putting my nerves at ease and making it (almost) painless. I was super nervous after friends told me about their horrible experiences sugar waxing at another establishment but this was nothing like they described. I WILL be going back and have already referred them.

resp.text: Rachel, thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! Your recommendation means so much to us and we're so happy to have earned it. Thank you again for taking the time to let us know about your positive experience. We look forward to seeing you again!

text: I normally visit the location in Jacksonville, FL which has always exceeded my expectations. I did check the reviews before I went to this location on 280 and I should have listened. This was the worst experience I’ve ever had with EWC. I didn’t feel welcome at all. Felt like my waxer gave me a hysterectomy.  To only find patches when I returned home. DON’T DO IT! Pay attention to these reviews.

resp.text: Hi Janet Brown, we regret to hear that you are displeased with your recent experience with us. Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (205) 637-3201. We look forward to hearing from you.

resp.text: Hi Sally ! We love having you at our center and are happy to hear you had a great experience. See you soon!

name: Kimberley Taylor
text: Would recommend to others. Today was my 3rd visit. Each time the staff has taken their time to explain the procedures while making me feel at ease.

name: mackenzie foster
text: They kept switching my wax appointment over the course of a week, which was fine, and the day of they switched it again because one girl had an emergency. Then 45 minutes before they cancelled it because of another “emergency”. I booked my first appointment 1.5 months before because I needed it done this one day. Very unprofessional and I will never book her again.

name: Jamecia Minter
text:
Adrian was amazing! I was so comfortable with her immediately as a first time guest, she answered all of the questions I had and she was extremely knowledgeable about every product and tips for first time waxers! Definitely give her a try, she won’t disappoint. 🖤

Also, the girls at the front desk were amazing and very kind!

name: Anita Sims
text: After 8 months of no waxing I drove from Montgomery for a Brazilian wax. Adrian was my wax specialist and she was the best. She gave me tips on care for my Brazilian wax and just made the experience comfortable.The Smooth Me and the new exfoliating scrub is LIFE! Definitely sticking with Adrian.

name: Jasmine Madden
text: Good

resp.text: Hi Jasmine! We love having you at our center and are happy to hear you had a great experience. See you soon!

name: Shelby Sandlin
text: Had been using this place for a while because they were the only ones around using hard wax. The last 2 experiences have been more than disappointing. So many hairs left and the last 2 times I have been burned bad enough for the burn to last a week. Called to let them know and was told the manager would call me about getting my money back. Still haven't heard from them. Don't go here. Go to LA Bikini. They charge to much at EWC for a half done job.

name: Crystal Parker
text: I just wanted to comment on yet another wonderful experience I had last weekend (11/18/2017). Lindsey took great care of me and she made sure I left satisfied. She is personable and efficient; I couldn't ask for anyone any better!

name: Corinna Bass
text:
I got a free wax from the Southern Women's Show from European Wax Center.  I called to make an appointment and was in the same day!  Doug Baker Blvd is definitely all the way down Hwy 280 from where I live in Homewood, however, the clean space I walked into was worth the drive!
The whole place is very streamlined and beautiful.   The products are beautifully displayed on the wall along with descriptions.
The receptionist was a very informative, sweet young lady that even gave me free samples when I showed interest, but did not purchase that day, which I loved!  (Some places feel "pushy" but here, I was very comfortable and left feeling pampered.)
The best part is, if you have never been, you can receive a free wax, and I love 'trying before buying!'
Tell them Corinna sent you!

resp.text: Hi Corinna! We love having you at our center and are happy to hear you had a great experience. See you soon!

name: Molly Johnson
text: Had a fantastic appointment with Amaryllis today and couldn’t be more satisfied. As an esthetician myself, I immediately worried about everything that could go wrong. She knows what she’s doing and she’s very personable. As a waxer myself, I know how important it is to be funny and have good conversation during such a long and intimate wax. So it was comfortable and great! I hate waxing myself so Amaryllis will definitely be my new go-to! No more doing acrobatics to try and wax myself!

resp.text: Molly, thank you so much for the positive review! We hope you have a great day!

name: Burthia Booker
text: Great service, both in front and in back. Clean, quick and efficient. I super appreciate this spot every time I go!

resp.text: Burthia, we are so happy to read such a great review about European Wax Center! Thank you again for letting our team know how we did! We look forward to helping again in the future. Take care!

name: Victoria Woodyard
text: Great establishment, always love the ending results. For your first visit get a complimentary wax by mentioning my name Victoria Woodyard for a special treat.

resp.text: Victoria, we're glad you had such a wonderful experience with us! Thanks again for the recommendation, and have an amazing day!

name: Quantoria Beverly
text: Adrian was my waxer and she’s great, but she no longer work with the company. Another person did my wax today and I had hairs left and wax left on me in several places. Now I have to go back Monday to get a touch up. There service have gone down hill and I pay entirely too much to have to come back. I think this is a little ridiculous. They should compensate you in some other way. I’m considering not coming back once my wax pass is finished. Will not be renewing unless my last wax with my pass is 100% flawless.

name: Monica “Beautiful Moe” Henderson
text: I took my daughter in to get her eyebrows waxed, we didn't have an appt but we were worked in. My daughter had an great experience with Ms. Erlinda she did a wonderful job and she was very professional. They have truly gained a new client. And Ms.Carolyn at the front desk was awesome as well. name: Melise Harris
text: First visit was very bad experience that resulted in me asking for my money back. The manager gave it back to me and was super nice about it so I decided to give them another try.  Only to find that they "lost" my reservation on the second visit. Rude receptionist and I've never been back and I wont go back. Facilities are clean and seems well kept but extremely cold and Dr office like. Not  inviting and comfortable. Keep looking.

name: Asia Alfred
text: Wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone!! The receptionist wasn’t the friendliest and the lady next to her seemed to have an attitude. I feel like if I’m spending my money here then I should at least get decent service WITHOUT attitude. Not to mention the lady who did my service acted as though she didn’t know what she was doing! Never again will I waste my money at this unprofessional place.

resp.text: Thank you for being a valued guest of European Wax Center. I'm sorry to hear about your experience in our Birmingham-Greystone location and appreciate you taking the time to make us aware of the situation. I'm so sorry to hear of your unsatisfied visit and would like to speak with you so we can discuss your experience in more detail. Our guest's satisfaction is very important to us, and we'll do our best to rectify the situation and better your experience moving forward. Please reach out to me at 205-637-3201 or direct message me with your contact info, and I'll be happy to contact you.

name: large marge
text:
I’ve been going to this location for over a year (EWC customer in other states since 2012) and I’ve never had a problem. Etoria is my waxer and she’s the best I’ve had. She’s professional, friendly, and makes you feel comfortable.

The waxer I use now is Abbey and she's great!

resp.text: Hi there. Thanks for reaching out! We are thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with Etoria and Abbey. Have a great day!

name: Chasity Pouge
text: I used to rave about this place but lately it has not been the best experience. The turnover is high which is bad enough but they will cancel your appointment at the last minute and then when I came in for my new rescheduled appointment I wasn’t even acknowledged by the receptionists. Yes plural because there was 2.  The usual receptionist knows me by face so I guess I didn’t think nothing of it when those two said nothing to me since they seemed preoccupied...one with another customer and the other took a call on her cell and stepped away. I waited 30 mins to find out that my rescheduled appointment needed to be cancelled because the tech had a family emergency and she left. Walked right pass me!  I finally got to my breaking point and acknowledged the 2 ladies and they had no excuses that made any sense. One of them said she thought I was someone else so I guess we all look alike to her but ok and the other one said with all honesty she simply said you are right we said nothing to you. She was the one who took the call on her cell. Ok so the only wax tech that was still there had I guess turned her wax up and said she could wax me but I needed to give her wax time to cool or I could reschedule again. I opted to wait another 15 mins to let it cool. I must say she was good and this my first time with her but she was actually super nice and I apologized for getting rowdy to her that is just how good she was. As I was leaving the 2 ladies in the front wanted to offer me something for my inconvenience but I got prepaid wax passes so there no credit that could be given so they opted to give me samples which I took cause no one has ever given me samples at this place. It’s sample though so I dunno if that is something spectacular. I asked for a number for management and they said that the manager would have to call me. That’s been a month ago and no call but my $121 pre paid wax pass payment just hit my card again today.  I see that isn’t being rescheduled!  So I said all this to say I might be calling the number and asking for a manager again and getting funds reversed because I can not keep coming to a sinking ship.  Maybe I will do a dispute with my bank and bypass trying to talk to anyone since I never got that call to begin with.

resp.text: Chasity Pouge, we regret to hear that you had a negative experience with us, but would appreciate the chance to turn your experience around. Thanks for bringing this matter to our attention. We would like to get more details about this; please reach out to us at your earliest convenience at  205.637.32.01.

name: Caitlin Carson
text:
DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY! Awkward ...overpriced and unsure of the experience of the technician (this place charges twice the going rate in our area and the service is not half as good as the other places!)

When I arrived the check in process was a little intrusive. The girl at the front desk wanted to see my driver’s license? I’ve been to several spas and had many waxes and never have been asked for a copy of my drivers license. That seems a little extreme for a spa service? But okay. I go to the restroom before my appt starts and when I’m walking back to the waiting area someone calls out my name from a room ..It was my technician (first visit at this place and don’t remember her name)? I felt like that was forward (but not so much so that it ruined the appt). However, then I step into my room and the technician tells me to undress from the waist down that she will do my brows first then my Brazillian ?!? So I don’t have a choice in this and have to lay there EXPOSED while my brows are being done?!? Not only that she didn’t go anywhere! She did not leave the room for me to undress and just stayed in there!?! That’s not typical. Every place I’ve ever been (and I’ve been to many saloons and spas) has always left me in the room to undress then they would come in. More so  than that I’m usually given something to cover up with until the service is needed in that area (unless it’s just a Brazillian that we go straight to). I did not like that!! It was strange and the technician didn’t say a word while she was working which makes things even more awkward!! Oh except for the “shave shaming” as if that’s the reason for the horrible pain that I feel when my hair is being ripped out of my skin around my pubic bone! Lol ?!? So the technician had a dry personality (looking back she seemed weird) ..I had to lay on the table exposed while my brows were getting done first (I didn’t have a choice in that or wasn’t told I did). Also, she stays in the room while I change!!! And when it’s over she stays in the room waiting for me to get dressed!! There was absolutely no concern for privacy or customary respect and boundaries. I much prefer the other place that I go (Marci’s Hoover). The prices are better. The experience isn’t creepy weird or demeaning and my technician is friendly and speaks!

Oh and heads up anyone who gets a brow wax, the technician removed all of my make up then waxed my brows! I told her that I prefer that she just get the strays outside of my make up. My brows are thinning and I have a particular shape that I prefer! That was not respected at all!! There is NO need to remove the make up first of all. (That’s just some personal preference of the technician). That should be the clients choice! We should be able to change without someone watching us when we arrive and before we leave!! There’s no way this place will stay around much longer if things don’t change! Why would anyone continue to pay twice the price for a worse experience!? It’s a strip mall wax place just like Marci’s ..only they advertise like it’s some type of luxury saloon. It’s not..thank goodness they didn’t try to sell me products or some membership. I hate it when I’m paying for a service and still being subjected to high pressure sales. So that is a bonus. To add to the bad experience my wax took close to 30 minutes! It’s never taken that long anywhere else. I don’t think the technician was very experienced. I also felt it was a little creepy that she didn’t say much at all but that she just stays in the room while I’m changing out and back into my clothes. When I was leaving I felt rushed, she was standing with her hand in the door watching me put my shoes on!! I felt rushed cuz her next appt was there! I mean give a a girl some space!

To the management: you need to take note of the things I’ve said. The only people  who wouldn’t be bothered by those things likely don’t know any better and probably haven’t been to other saloons.

resp.text: Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (205) 637-3201. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Keri McDonald
text: Best wax ever. I’ve been going for awhile now. Ask for Lindsey she is the best. Very informative, quick, efficient, and really sweet.

name: Staci Galey
text: Friendly staff from the moment I walked in. Adrian was my waxer and was so good at her job and quick. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Hi Staci, thank you so much for your positive comments about European Wax Center! We look forward to your next visit! Take care!

name: Minjee Kim
text: It was my first waxing and Eetoria made everything so comforting and easy! She explained everything fully and the waxing itself was not bad at all. I will definitely come to this place next time.

name: Alicia Hayes
text: Loved the ladies there... Super friendly and didn't make me feel akward for my first time! Will be back soon!!!

resp.text: Alicia Hayes, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at European Wax Center! We hope to see you soon!

name: Liz Love
text: I love going to this place! The reception ladies are always super nice! And Lindsey is hands down the best waxer!! She’s super friendly, incredibly knowledgeable, and she always makes you feel comfortable!! Great job guys!

name: Jora_Fjord
text: As a newbie of the waxing world, I was super nervous when I decided to get a Brazilian wax done. I saw Lindsey and I have stuck with her ever since. She is awesome! She made me feel super welcome and kept me laughing and distracted the whole time. She talked me through each step and was patient with me and she made sure I was happy with the result before she was done. If you want to see someone who can make you laugh your anxiety away and feel as comfortable as possible then I highly recommend seeing Lindsey!

name: Alexis Green
text: I was excited to get my eyebrows done here because my mom had been talking about how good they did hers and how painless it was. But my experience here completely differed. When I was getting my eyebrows waxed, I suffered through like 10 minutes of painful plucking after getting them already waxed for them to barely look different from before hand. There were little places where you could tell more hair was pulled. I personally was just not satisfied and have gotten better eyebrow waxing from nail salons for 15 dollars. I geuss the experience all depends on the person who does it.

name: Deaunqua Bryant
text: I have used many European Wax Center locations and I can honestly say that the staff her is unparalleled. My esthetician Etoria did an amazing job and kept me as clean as possible as painless as possible and Cassandra made check in and check out super simple.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive review about your recent experience with us! We look forward to your next visit! Take care!

name: Michael
text: Walked in with my fiancée at 5pm today (Saturday) thinking they closed at 6. There wasn't anyone at the front desk so we took a seat - some people were in the back and noticed us but didn't say anything to us. Then I guess the front desk girl got back with some ice cream or something and that's when we found out they only take appointments(?) and even though they're still open for an hour and everyone is just chilling in the back talking there's just absolutely no way possible to fit us in for anything. It would have been understandable if she wasn't basically laughing at us for asking.

name: Tracey Gamble
text: Lindsey was super awesome and made me feel very comfortable during her service. I was literally scared out of my mind because it was my first time and just knew the pain was going to be intense. For the very first time it wasn't bad at all. Glad I got it done.

text: I had been looking around for a place to get a Brazilian done. I heard of this place on the radio and figured I'd give it a shot. The place was clean, people were nice. I was scared of showing my girly bits to a stranger but Adrian was very professional and made me feel not so very self conscious. I will be going here again.

No one called to tell me that I was coming to an appointment that was going to be cut short or cancelled. When I called three hours before, no one took the opportunity to say "we're a little backed up," or I wouldn't have driven so far, especially in HWY 280 traffic. This whole experience has been terrible. I'll not ever go back or rep your services.

text: This is my second time coming to EWC and I’m still in love. My wax specialist Etoria is AMAZING!!!

text: Excellent service, extremely thorough. The facility was very clean and discrete and the team members were super knowledgable and friendly.

name: Nadia Al-Kahlout
text: I’ve worked here as a guest service associate and have tried every waxer up until I left. The only reason I keep coming back is because of Adrian. She is by far the best waxer. She makes sure that it’s as painless as possible, she follows every step necessary to ensure sanitation is correct and that you leave with flawless skin. I can’t stress how much of an amazing waxer she is. I may not get the discount I once did while working there, but honestly I don’t care. She makes sure that my money is well spent. Amazing eyebrows and Brazilian. And she will give you helpful tips on how to ensure that your waxing experience is amazing. I suggest making an appointment with her. You won’t regret it.

text: I got my first Brazilian wax here months ago and I’ve been hooked every since. I recommend booking Adrian she always makes me feel comfortable and she does a great job!

name: Katherine Armstrong
text:
I went in yesterday for a Brazillian wax. I've had many before at EWC, so I knew the kind of pain that I was in store for. I have sensitive skin and a low pain tolerance, so as always, I was very nervous.

However, yesterday's session was by far the best wax I've ever had. It was all thanks to the wax specialist, Lindsey.

She was the kindest, most encouraging woman I've ever had at EWC. Not only was she fast and did an excellent job, she made sure I was comfortable the entire time. She constantly asked, "Are you okay?" and said, "I'm so proud of you, you're doing so well!"

To say I was happy with the service is a complete understatement. I will definitely be asking for Lindsey every time I go to EWC, whether it's in Tuscaloosa or Birmingham.

Thank you, Lindsey!

name: Mike Brooks

Posting this for someone else.

Do not give these people your business. They will charge you more than advertised and their staff is incompetent. They are deceptive, purposely or not, about what they're actually doing to your hair. They won't give you the right color if you're getting it dyed. They use products that will ruin your hair. Some workers will literally rip some of your hair out trying to brush it. Just woefully incompetent and a terrible business overall. I can't speak for their massages but based on this absolutely terrible experience, these people deserve to go out of business.

text: Our couples massage was so relaxing and comfortable. The massage therapists were very professional and informative. We had a great experience from the moment we checked in until we walked out. We'll definitely be back.

name: Rhonda Taylor
text: Nowhere near as serene and nice as the previous location. Loud talking in the hallway. Brightly lit. Masseuse rolled around on a stool to get from one side of the table to the other. Sheet was dirty or stained. Headrest tattered and unsightly. Supposed to be for a 90 minute massage...Appointment was for 1:00. I was collected at 1:10. Walked back out in the lobby to pay at 2:20. Add in an additional 5 minutes lost to getting re-dressed. So yeah, more like a 65 minute massage though 90 minutes were purchased. Honestly, I was just ready to go and didn't bother mentioning it. Other than rolling around on the stool, the masseuse did a good job but I won't be back. This wasn't the "spa experience " that I'm used to experiencing.

resp.text: We do appreciate your feedback, as we have built our 20 year business on customer service. We are continuing to upgrade and renovate as we did at our previous location. This year has been hard on businesses, and has slowed this process down. We care about every single person who walks in our doors and the experience they have. We do wish you would have let us know, as we never want anyone to leave unsatisfied.

text: First time and last time there. I will not be back. I’ve had experience others massages in the past but this was the worst. We went in as a group and I was rushed to get underdressed l, time was cut in half. My group was still getting their massage while I was already finished. The person that was given the massage seems  as if she was scared to touch me. After we all meet up the discuss our massage over bunch mines was no where near as to what that had. $110 plus a tip down the drain for nothing. So it’s a no for me!! Sorry not sorry!!

name: J Mo
text: I really wish this spa would not have changed locations. The old location felt more like a spa. The lobby was spread out, a water feature and music were the sounds heard. You went to a locker room to change into a robe. A nice glass of wine or a mimosa was offered. The new location is small, has an overly bright lobby that feels more like a doctor’s office. You aren’t taken to a locker room and given a robe and sandals. The massage room was also too bright, as the windows were not covered well. There were sounds of people moving things and talking down the hall. There was very little sound insulation. There was no cafe to sit and have a snack. Afterwards, I asked if there were showers. I was directed to a small bathroom with very little privacy. The shower fixtures weren’t working properly. I really miss the sauna and hot tub as well. I’ve spent thousands of dollars over the years at this spa even though it was out of the way for me, but unfortunately I will not be returning. I want to feel relaxed and pampered, not like a patient in a doctors office.

resp.text: We apologize for your unhappiness with our new location as we are still renovating. Due to this years unexpected events it has been slower than anticipated. Of course, no one expects to move a 20 year old business, but with no roof and safe structure we could no longer feel safe. When life hands you lemons you make lemonade. We do appreciate your patronage over the years, and you will be missed.

name: Barbara Steve Harrington
text: I went in to buy a facial product.  The staff was super helpful and friendly helping me choose a product, but I was shocked that the front desk person was not wearing a mask.  For a place that is supposed to be a "wellness" center, I found this very irresponsible, especially considering the tiny front room/check out area that is impossible to maintain 6 feet of distance.  I'm disappointed- have been going to Santa Fe for about 12 years to get facials and skin care products.  I will not be going back until well after the pandemic is over and masks are no longer needed.

name: Lillie Allen
text: Love this place the people are so nice, and the environment is very calming to the point of falling asleep! The new sauna is amazing I got in before my massage, and the massage was breathtaking with candles lit around me while soothing music played. I will definitely be back 😁

I really just wanted a relaxing Swedish massage for my birthday, but oh my goodness it was so bad!!! I left feeling less relaxed than when I got there, along with shoulder pain I did not have before! name: Abigail Davis
text:
I decided to try the SNS powder out here, which is supposed to last for 3 weeks. I chipped one a nail after 4 days, and then because my nails were so thin from them buffering my nails to oblivion, it broke off. Another nail followed suit 2 days later. I went in to get the powder taken off, and they proceeded to cut me with the nail buffer. He offered no refund, even though I paid $60 in total for a manicure that was supposed to last for 3 weeks. Very disappointed with the service and quality. Their customer service is inexcusably poor, and I feel that I should have been offered a refund considering I paid for a manicure that was supposed to last 3 weeks, but received one that lasted as long if not shorter than a manicure I could have given myself at home.

**edit: these are my nails TWO MONTHS after they took my polish off. You can clearly see the lines on my nails where the buffed my nails to oblivion. My nails have been breaking off and shredding every time I try and grow them out.

resp.text:
First,Miss Davis,really thanks your business for our nail salon.
The SNS (dipin powder)is the most popular and healthy way to get nails done in the US,it fit almost all person.We take time and guarantee 3 weeks last.About your first time SNS experience ,We feel sorry and tried to do our best to handle this situation with more graciousness.You felt your nails got thinner, powder chiped by some reason and you really don't like SNS.All right,No matter what reason you don't like it,we soaked them off from your nails for free and offerd additional discount for your next time visit of going back to previous gel color.And the way we soaked your powder is sand first then wrap with cotton and acetone, Not just soak your fingers in a bowel of acetone to cause your finger skin dry.But,Perhaps you just don't like drill sander ...
Additionally,our price of SNS with full manicure is $50.
Miss Davis.We wished we could do more for you to make you happier.Please call us at 205.823.1428 so we can best assist you and follow up with you. Thank you.

name: J Smith
text: This nail salon is awful! I walk in and there is this woman with scrubs on and a winter hat and scarf. I kid you not! She tells me to sit. The place is empty so i think i beat the rush. There was no rush. She starts to remove the gel polish and cuts my fingers trying to buff it off. She was very slow and at 30 minutes into the appointment she never spoke. Then, another lady came in and she stopped doing my nails and calls this older woman out from the back to finish my manicure. This lady is wearing a jacket and scarf wrapped around her neck. Want to know why? BECAUSE ITS JANUARY AND ITS FREEZING IN THE PLACE!!! I had to ask to put my coat back on because i was so cold and this was going on an hour at this point. The older lady never spoke but she ripped my cuticles off and made me bleed. I hated every second of it. I should have walked out. Go anywhere else but Nail Fever in Vestavia!!

name: Alyssa Hansen
text: While I would love to rate this 5 stars for the absolutely spectacular massages my wife and I received, we got slapped with some fees that weren’t explained to us or shown at the time of booking. What we thought would be $150 experience put us double that in the hole. The website states an intro massage is $60 and a hot stone $80, so we booked one of each and asked if we could be in the same room (as in a couples massage). Had the most relaxing, soothing experience from beginning to end. But unknown to us, there’s a separate charge for a couples massage. It was never stated during booking, during check in, or during check out. And unfortunately I was so relaxed as we paid, I didn’t think to ask the total, nor was the total given to me. Just took my card, swiped, and we left. Didn’t realize the extra charge was there til checking our statement today. Called and THEN for the 1st time we heard about the couples massage fee. And now it’s too late. It’s a shame because Tai gave the best massage I’ve ever had, but I won’t be back due to irresponsible charging.

resp.text: Hi, thank you for reaching out with your honest concerns. We are disappointed to hear about your recent experience. If you are willing, please call or email us directly at (256) 384-1178 or Mgr.huntsville@handandstone.com so we can discuss how we can begin to make this better. We value your business and we hope to hear from you soon.

name: Elena Sierakowski
text: I went here for my birthday and it was my first time visiting. I had Nick and he was amazing!! He started our session off by asking questions so he’d know how to best help fix me. I’ve had a lot of built up stress from work and kids and he did a wonderful job of getting out most of my knots and getting rid of my headache. It was a really great experience and I absolutely plan on coming back!

name: Marlena Kenney
text: Ty is the absolute best! She addressed my areas of concern and I felt 100% better. I will be returning for her professionalism & expertise. Thanks Ty! 😁

resp.text: Hi Marlena, thanks for highlighting our staff in your positive review! If there is ever anything else we can assist you with, please don't hesitate to reach out.

name: Jessica Brown
text:
I had my first prenatal massage with Tara and let me just say, WONDERFUL! I went in with some tension in my shoulders and upper back (pregnancy during a pandemic can be stressful 🤣) so I called prior to my appointment to ask if the prenatal massage could be customized and if I could have more of a focus in that  area rather than in my lower back that typically accompanies pregnancy. Of course, the ladies up front that answered my call were incredibly friendly and went out of their way to check with the therapist instead of just placating me with some generic answer. They were also very friendly and professional when I arrived.
Once it came time for my massage, Tara explained everything first and made me feel completely at ease and comfortable. I did add on the Lavender aromatherapy and wondered if it would be worth it or not due to wearing a mask. It. Was. Worth. It. Just do it. You won’t regret it. The massage itself was excellent and met all of my standards. There was a time or two that I almost felt like asking her to move on to a different area because the pressure was beginning to be too much for me (it was a good hurt, don’t worry, I’m just a wimp), but it was almost as if she was so in tuned with me that she moved on before I got to that point. At checkout, they were offering  a wellness package, and while I passed on it due to the fact that I’ll be having a baby soon and won’t have the availability for a while, it is definitely something I’ll consider in the future. If you want to ensure you’ll make time for a monthly massage or facial, get it! It’s time to treat yourself!

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your positive experience, Jessica! We are happy to hear you are feeling relaxed and rejuvenated after your appointment at Hand & Stone Huntsville! We look forward to your next visit.

name: Rosalee Martin
text:
Kim did my facial/waxing and it was amazing. She was open and let me know I could speak up of I didn't like something
It was like being with a long time friend. I was so incredibly relaxed after. I will be coming back. The front desk staff was so nice as well.

name: Bonnie Robertson
text: Monica was detail oriented, skilled and fun to talk with. Hydro-facial revived skin stressed by wearing a mask. Highly recommend asking for her by name!

name: Jeanna Lang
text:
Pros: Clean facility, you can book online to suit your schedule, decent price

Cons: While you can book online, they constantly call to ask you to change your appt to what suits them better. When I first went in, I was convinced to sign up, with a selling point that family members got the same rate as the member. I started booking for my Husband. They then told me it was only once every six months a guest could come in. So we signed him up. We have each had several massages there. Only one each has been great (Vielka and Shirley). The great massage therapists book far in advance which leaves you with subpar at best to choose from. It’s been disappointing.

name: Victoria Brown
text: I have had deep tissue massages all over the country and world because of my military career. This place is HANDS DOWN the BEST!!! It is hard to find a spa that has such highly trained and knowledgable staff which is led by the  lead therapist Terra! I have been going for 3 or 4 months now and the difference is AMAZING! DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!!! 6 STARS!!!
