text: I had a wonderful experience.  The staff was friendly and my therapist Shirley was really great.  I highly recommend the Himalayan salt hot stone treatment.

name: Kaitlin Bachmeyer
text: Wonderful Experience! Everyone in the building was sweet, kind and helpful. The Therapist I saw was a true Healer! On our first meeting she directly addressed issues with her hands which my past 5 medical doctors had not been able to figure out. The experience and intuition she brought into our session made me feel "seen" and cared for the first time in years. I was nervous to come in because of COVID19 but they have their sanitary policies down pat, and I felt very comfortable that they were being diligent with hygiene! Thank you Hand and Stone of Huntsville!

resp.text: Kaitlin, thank you for the kind words and wonderful review! It brings us great joy to see our members and guests happy. We look forward to seeing you again soon! Take care!

text: I’ve had massages here since it opened. Whitney has been my massage therapist the last 3 times , I highly recommend her to anyone who wants a deep tissue, hot stone , or just a relaxing massage. She does amazing work and has just a really chill and relaxing personality. Front desk staff are friendly and very helpful. Seriously great place to get a massage and have all your aches , pains , and stress melt away.

resp.text: We are happy to hear you've found the perfect massage therapist for you, James! Thank you for sharing and we look forward to your next visit!

text: Facilities are clean and modern, staff is friendly, and they offer a wide variety of services at a reasonable cost.  However, scheduling can be tricky and walk-ins are rarely available.  The monthly membership is the worth it if you need a massage frequently.

text: Received a massage as a birthday gift and I was very happy with the one I got! Katie, the masseuse, was professional, kind, and accommodating, and provided a very relaxing experience. Everything was incredibly clean and the atmosphere was perfect. Will definitely be back for more!

name: Olivia Pannell
text: I came in for a facial and Ken did and Amazing job! She was very thorough and patient you can tell she cares about her work and her guests being comfortable. She checked on me continuously during the service especially during the extractions. The experience was seamless all the way from the phone call to make an appointment until I walked out!

name: Audrey Fitz-Gerald
text: Not only did I have a scheduling issue with my first visit but I had a problem with my second . I'm 16 weeks pregnant. I made this abundantly clear on my paperwork (which they claim I didn't fill out LIES) . I also made it clear on my first appointment. When I booked my second appointment I showed up and they cancelled on me bc "they didn't know I was pregnant " and she implied it was my fault for not telling them 🤦🏼‍♀️ MAM ! I filled out 500 questionnaires and have already gotten one prenatal !  Anyways , the manager is rude and poorly informed . I cancelled my membership and plan on writing several more reviews. If you're pregnant or just value your time STAY CLEAR !

resp.text: Audrey, falling short of meeting your expectations is not to the standards we strive to achieve, and we humbly ask for the opportunity to make this right. If you are willing, please contact us at (256) 384-1178 or Mgr.huntsville@handandstone.com. Thank you providing this information so we can improve upon our services.

text: I love this place! They are really professional and make you feel so comfortable. Chris is amazing! My husband uses Tangela and he said she’s amazing as well! Definitely worth the membership

name: Nicole Story
text: After verbally twlling me they excepted Spafinder gift cards, the declined it when I went in for my treatment.  I was a few minutes late and it took 15 minutes to get my Visa gift card from the car. I was then told that I only had time for 30 minutes  of my hour massage.  I left in tears! I have never felt so embarrassed and lied to.

resp.text: Hi, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We take our reviews seriously and would like the chance to look into your particular situation further. When you have a chance, please reach out to the spa at (256) 384-1178 or Mgr.huntsville@handandstone.com and we can try and turn your experience around. We hope to hear from you soon.

name: Shalayne Palmer
text: The service is AMAZING and I love the atmosphere.

name: Samantha Taylor
text: Very happy with my experience here! The entire staff was welcoming and accommodating as soon as I walked in the door. The waiting area was beautiful, tranquil and clean. I chose to get a 1 hour deep tissue massage which was incredible. The massage therapist was very attentive and she did a wonderful job listening to me and ensuring the pressure was just right. I would highly recommend this place to anyone and everyone looking for a truly relaxing experience. I will be back!

name: Ashley Kelly
text: Very nice and clean place.  Staff was extremely nice and accommodating.  My masseuse was good, but I will ask for someone different next time.  There was an area in the shoulders that she seemed to want to REALLY work out (however, I think it was part of my natural anatomy maybe because it never budged and it was present on both sides), and she pressed so hard for so long that it became uncomfortable and hurt, so I had to ask her to stop (let me clarify, I'm not a wimp, I can take pain). She moved on to the other areas in my back, legs, and feet which felt really good, but she had spent so much time on the shoulder area, that I felt those areas did not get as much attention as they needed. I will give it 4 stars because I did not encounter an unfriendly person the entire time I was there, and it was extremely clean and tranquil.  I will give the masseuse 3 stars.  I will go back.  I would like to give their other services a try as well.

name: Daniel Johnson
text: An absolutely wonderful experience!  Very professional staff who is amazing at their profession.   I will definitely get another appointment!

name: kelli jones
text: Always professional especially during covid everything is clean, staff is friendly they do temp. Checks and everyone wears a mask, and the message is very relaxing and they pay attention to your issues you need wrking on wear you carry more stress, I ve been going to Daniel for a yr hes the best massage therapist

name: Lindsey Goldensoph
text: I had Matthew for a massage today. Not only was he very kind but he also was very skilled and did an amazing job. The front desk associates were incredibly welcoming and sweet. I am very impressed and will only be going to Hand & Stone from now on! The introductory cost is incredibly low for the quality of an experience you get in return. I would recommend this establishment to everyone I know!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review! We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your service at Hand & Stone Huntsville! Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!

name: Britania
text: Everyone was so attentive to the clients needs.

name: Matthew Pickens
text: I've had three sessions with Hand and Stone so far, and each one has been exemplary. The greeting/checkout staff are marvelously helpful and always cheerful; they provide a welcoming, relaxing vibe from walking in to walking out. I've been having deep-tissue massages with Ronnie S., and I cannot recommend him highly enough. His technique is masterful, and he is always highly communicative about what he is doing, why he is doing it, and with frequent checks to make sure the pressure he's applying is appropriate. Already looking forward to my next appointment!

name: Perry Taylor
text: Good concept .   Yet the level of service is inconsistent and pricy for the level received.

resp.text: Hello Perry, we appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your recent experience with us. Our staff is trained to provide each of our guests with the highest caliber of customer service and professionalism, so we are concerned to learn about your visit. Please reach out to us directly at (256) 384-1178 or Mgr.huntsville@handandstone.com so we can discuss your experience further. We hope to hear from you soon.

name: Anilee Bailey
text: I went in for a prenatal massage. First, it was extremely clean and relaxing. Second, everyone there was incredibly nice. Third, the massage was amazing. I'm totally going back

name: Kesha Jones
text: My very first time coming here. Soon as I walked inside the ladies at the desk made me feel welcomed as they greeted me with a smile. I checked in and they gave me a form to fill out. As I was filling out the form one lady offered me water (mango water) and I said yes and she fixed it for me. About 5min later another young lady came over and told me where the restrooms where and explained to me how I can change the settings of the fan in the massage room and also the heating temperature on the bed... absolutely amazing customer service, very friendly staff, very relaxing and clean atmosphere. The Deep Tissue massage, Valindsia did a phenomenal job... I've had plenty massages at other places but this one was by far the best!!!! I left feeling like a brand new person, can't wait til my next appointment next month😁

name: Schinell Walker
text: First i must say i love this place,it  is clean and the staff is friendly i went in for a 3pm appointment and had MONICA doing my microdermabrasion facial she was AWESOME💯💯💯 as the process went by she gave me info on all the products she was using and what they were for i was so relaxed i almost fell asleep. I love her  and i highly recommend this place.

name: The Smith Adventures
text: My husband does their monthly package and we travel a lot so we have a chance to check out multiple Hand and Stone location. The staff at this location was very friendly and helpful. We both had a massage and I had a facial. Both of us were happy with our massages and I was happy with my facial. We live about 3m5 hours away but will be back again and make it a little mini getaway. Also be aware parking can be a bit tough at meal times as there are a lot of restaurants close.

name: Joëline Mpabwa
text: Katy was amazing!! My first time coming here and they made me feel welcomed. Katt was so on point with all my knots area and took special time to advise me on what I should do to help me with releasing the knots on my own time. I felt very comfortable and relaxed. Will definitely book again. I strongly recommend this place👍🏾

name: Empala “The Chevyweight” McCraw
text: Ask for Kat. You will not regret it.

name: Kendal Zabel
text: Not bad, I don't think they actually hit the one hour that was paid for. This was a gift and the person mentioned starting a little late and getting into her car at the one hour mark. With dressing, and walking out etc. I would say she prob got 40 min, paid for 60. Aside from that ... People were nice, clean facility, relaxing environment, experienced MT.

name: Empala “The Chevyweight” McCraw
text: Ask for Kat. You will not regret it.

resp.text: Anita, thanks for letting us know you had such a great experience! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Felecia Wright
text: I have really enjoyed the experience of being a member of Hand and Stone. I have enjoyed every visit and each therapist did a great job. They were all very professional however, my last visit was with Tangela.... and she was phenomenal!!! Her knowledge base was evident in her skills. She took the time before starting  to determine what was needed to benefit me most during my session by asking questions and listening. Thank you Tangela. It was a pleasure being your client! Although I am choosing  to find a facility closer to my home,I am sure I will visit again in the future.

name: Genea Flowers
text: I love Hand & Stone, everyone is always so nice and welcoming.  I especially love my massage therapist Terra she is top notch!

name: Patience Samson
text: Several excellent massueses.

name: Vanessa Williams
text: I really enjoy the facial.  The lady (forgot her name) was so nice, and made me feel so special.

name: Allen Lastinger
text: The Hand and Stone do a fabulous job of making you feel welcome and comfortable. The wait is  short when you make an appointment. The facility is very clean and modern and the staff are friendly. The massage therapist was great and attentive to my needs. I will be back soon!

name: Kathleen Hair
text: Nice, quiet and relaxing. Gave 4 stars due to a billing issue that yet has been resolved.

name: Shannon Creel
text: My wife enjoyed the place I got it for her birthday

name: Christal Howard
text: Every time I’ve been here has always been a great experience.  Front desk personnel are great too!  We had a little SNAFU with my recent appointments and they worked everything out for my granddaughter and I.

resp.text: We work hard to ensure all of our guests receive the best treatment! Thank you for recognizing our efforts at Hand & Stone Huntsville and for the positive review! Have a great day!

name: Nichole Collins
text: I was so excited when I heard this place was opening. When I finally decided to come in, I was not disappointed! The front desk is very welcoming and knowledgeable, they answered all of my questions. The lobby is very homey and relaxing. I absolutely loved my massage! If you go, I recommend the Himalayan salt stones!

name: Amanda Simon
text: Love at first visit! The front desk ladies are so warm and welcoming. For me it feels like a visit with friends. My massage therapist is AMAZING! He helps me be my best self. By helping me relax, I can continue to be a great wife and mother to my little girls.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review! We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your service at AL Huntsville! Thank you again and we hope to see you back soon!

name: Julie Shewmaker
text: I enjoy the facials at Hand and Stone and the variety of products/services they offer.  The only thing I do miss is the hand/arm/neck massage that was included at my previous Spa while the mask was working its magic! It may be that these are add-on options but I have not been made aware of them.

resp.text: It is always a pleasure to see you again! Thanks for the wonderful review and valuable feedback! We can't wait for your next visit!

name: Jasmine Spruill-Young
text:
I received a gift certificate to Hand and Stone. From booking online and choosing my massage therapist to the wonderful service received from Anthony to the actual massage, my experience at Hand and Stone was great. They have a wonderful ambiance when entering and great staff.

The massage therapist, Cat, read my intake form and listened when I discussed my problem areas. She provided me with tips when I'm between massages. Thanks so much for a great experience.

name: Anna Rosado
text: This was my first experience getting a professional massage and it was absolutely incredible!! Super kind and friendly staff, warm and serene rooms and very clean. I got the hot stone massage with Vielka and she did an outstanding job getting the knots out of my back and completely relaxed me. This place will be a regular part of my self-care routine!

name: Prinal Patel
text: Absolutely loved my visit to Hand & Stone! The front desk staff was super friendly. My massage was with Tangela, who was superb. I upgrade to an 80 minute Himalayan salt stone massage with her. I will never go back to a regular massage or a different therapist. The whole experience was fabulous!

name: Tasha Vineyard
text:
If I can I will Always add the scalp massage. Super soothing and relaxing. The whole experience was great and I'll definitely go back.

Editing my review to add that as a member I am never able to schedule a convenient appointment time online and that the staff turnover has not allowed me to schedule with the same massage therapist twice. I was charged for an appointment I wasn't at even though I called the day before to cancel. I spoke with someone earlier this week to cancel my membership and she said she would have the manager call me back when she came in , in a "little bit" that phone call was never returned . I get physician prescribed massages for anxiety  and since joining I've only been able to utilize my membership twice. I started out going to Journey in Madison but this was closer to my home, however after this experience I will be making the extra drive.

name: Christie Moore
text: Tangela was phenomenal!  This was my first massage and my oh my.  I was thrilled to find out that there was a membership that included monthly visits.  The staff was A+ from the moment I stepped through the door.  Can't wait for my next visit!!

name: Dakota Dunn
text: My experience was great! The place was very clean and the people were also so nice. If you want a massage I highly recommend Valindsia she done an amazing job for me!!!

resp.text: Thanks for highlighting our staff in your positive review! If there is ever anything else we can assist you with, please don't hesitate to reach out.

name: Adiana Cox
text: Fantastic establishment!  The environment is beautiful!, Clean, and comfortable!  The ladies are warm and friendly, and totally professional.  My first appointment was handled professionally and I was/am very happy with the result of my waxing.  I will return.

name: Andy Simon
text:
It was my first session although my wife goes here several times a week - she loves it. My masseur used the "Firm" setting and I gotta tell you it was great. My lower back had chronic pain and after my massage it is completely gone.

Very professional and relaxing atmosphere, effective massage - what more can you ask for ? I will be going back there.

name: Riley Couch
text: Amazing environment. As soon as I walked in I was greeted by Anthony and Sherie who welcomed me with smiles and kind words and answered all questions I had. Daniel did my massage and he had the hands of an Angel! Ended up buying a membership because it was that AWESOME! Best place in town!

name: Jessica Geisen
text: My experience was amazing from the moment I stepped in the doors! Every staff member was so courteous and knowledgeable and my session was completely tailored to my needs. Terra was absolutely amazing and I can’t wait to see her again in 2 weeks. I HIGHLY recc Hand and Stone Huntsville!

name: Kendria Jones
text: My husband and I had a wonderful experience. The couples massage is amazing. The therapist worked out kinks that I didn’t know I had. Truly enjoyed it.

name: Jennifer Gallagher
text: I had an amazing massage by Vielka. I would totally recommend her to anyone looking to book here. The spa is nice and conforms with all the other hand stone massage spa in the US. Super friendly staff as well! I will definitely be booking again in the future.

name: Ann Creager
text: Wonderful experience. Staff was so friendly and helpful. Daniel was great. I would recommend going to everyone!!

name: Tamyra Sampson
text: Great massage and servicd

name: Amber Young
text: Overall it was relaxing. I felt like the massage was more rubbing than massaging. As a runner I like massages to dig into all the overused muscles. Also, I paid extra for a peppermint scalp massage ($15). Although it felt good, it lasted for about 1 minute and my massage ended early. I arrived at 11:57 for my 12 o'clock appointment. I went back to the room around 12:10 for my 1 hour massage and additional scalp massage and i was released at 12:58. I feel like if you are going to pay for an extra service that should not take away from the original service you paid for. Pay more, get less does not seem like a good way to handle clients.

name: Suzanne Franco
text: Massage was great!!  Room was relaxing! Highly recommended

name: Heather Hamilton
text: The massage was good; however the add on of the cold stone face massage was a disappointment.  The initial towel was lukewarm instead of hot and the stones that are supposed to be placed under my eyes kept falling off.  It definitely was not worth the extra $15. I mentioned my disappointment to the masseuse and receptionist.

name: Bree Welch
text: Hand and Stone will forever be a part of my self care routine. Lovely staff, relaxing atmosphere, and very knowledgeable on all their practices, if you are curious I highly suggest just booking one appointment and your mind will be made up. Also they offer prenatal massages!

name: Joshua C. Francis
text: Awesome service. Very clean and serene setting. One of the best massages I have ever had.

name: Amber Parker
text: Great massage! Valindsia was very accommodating and ensured I was comfortable from beginning to end.

text: I really love this place, the atmosphere is so calming and relaxing. It’s super clean and top notch. I have seen a few therapists, my favorites are Terra, Daryel and Paul

name: Vielka P
text: Love the Hot Stone! Very relaxing feeling good for muscle tightness and stress.

name: Charles Francis
text: Superb, one of the best I have ever been to around the world. Very clean, elegant, and professional. Highly recommend. Ask for Sara

text: Had a facial today. Hannah did a great job! Will definitely be back

text: My massage was decent but covered a limited range, and the person who massaged my girlfriend did not know what he was doing and kept rambling on about his life.

text:
My husband and I went for a couple's deep tissue massage deep tissue was seriously lacking. My husband travels extensively we just celebrated our 24th year
anniversary and my appointment was below par  for a $179 for a deep tissue massage.

resp.text: We're so sorry to hear about your experience, Jaylee. Our massage therapists are trained to provide professional, high quality service. We value your feedback and would love to discuss your recent visit further. When convenient, please reach out to us via phone or email at (256) 384-1178 or Mgr.huntsville@handandstone.com to do so.

I am really looking forward to my next visit to Hands And Stone massage, and I will definitely be scheduling my next visit with Tangela!

name: Christopher Cross, PhD
text: As a small business owner myself, I understand the challenges faced during covid. However, there are some basics that should always be followed: 1) an update pricing list, 2)adherence to quality, and 3)customer service. Unfortunately, this establishment and in particular my nail tech did not meet those standards. $45 for a manicure and pedicure that lasted ~25m out of the 50m allotment and the quality mirrors that reduced effort. My nails were left uneven and jagged. I tried to address it and was told that’s the best they could do (although they still kept my cash tip). I really wish they would have taken the time to do a better job and fix their mistakes.

name: Latia Williams
text: I don't know who this guy is but he is so awesome. My pedicure was everything matter fact the best I've had in dothan. He didn't just rub lotion on my legs he massaged and gave me just what i needed from working all week long. Thank you so much i now how a new pedicure person

resp.text: You are so sweet. It was great to have you as our customer. Hope to see you soon.

name: Phoebe K Fairbairn
text: went in to get my set removed and a manicure, and the woman who did my nails was very nice, and professional. however the man who was supposed to do my friend’s nails cut her nail bed so bad it bled, yelled at her for not knowing what color she wanted, tried to charge her before doing her nails, and then was incredibly rude after she refused service. the only reason i’m not leaving one is because the rest of the staff was nice

name: Ariel Sliger
text: I came in and asked for a overlay with a little length to it.  Yes my nails are short but I have done it personally and have had it done SEVERAL times on my nails without a tip or form and it was super quick never had any issues until now!!! I was told that's not possible. He was rude and they like to talk about you to other employees in a different language. Super unprofessional. Also he got an attitude when I told him I didn't want gel seeing as my acrylic wasn't how I wanted it and still tried to use it. Then I asked for the regular polish and didn't even get the color I picked! I picked a pretty red and literally got ORANGE.  Will NEVER waste anymore money here.

It was dirty where you put your nails under the light. Just was not relaxing or pleasant experience.  And they DEFINATLY talk about you in their language.

name: Rhonda Dover
text: Went in for powder dip over my natural nails, Emily tech, worst nail job I've ever had.  Powder not dipped evenly,  made my fingers bleed. She was in  a hurry and for no apparent reason,  no one waiting and only 3 people in salon.  She didn't care about her services and that I was not happy.  Color picked out was no where close to the sample either. Don't recommend her or salon

name: Krystal Wells
text: I went to get a fill in on 5/6/21 and I showed the lady how I wanted my nails and she didnt say she didnt know to to design nails until after she started painting  them and then messed up my nails and act like she didn't want to.fix them so I left the store unsatisfied with service and even the owner didnt want to fix my nails talkingbout he was tired  you never leave a unsatisfied customer walk out will never recommend any to go here

name: Nicalee Powers
text: my favorite salon to go to in dothan! i’ve never been disappointed by any nails i’ve gotten

resp.text: You are very nice. I appreciate your time leaving feedback for our store. See you soon.

name: Mariel Higuera
text:
I wasn't sure about doing this review but I have to do it so other people don't put their nails at risk.
It was the worst experience I have ever had in my life, I was the only person in the salon and the man who started cutting my nails with a regular nail clipper was doing it in such a hurry that he broke two of my natural nails in half,
I told him to stop and obviously I did not apply them but he did not even apologize, even today I still cannot apply nails again because my natural nail still needs to heal, NEVER GO!!

name: Brandy Butler
text: Omg it was awful first of all let me begin ny saying that I'm partially paralyzed on the left side of my body...........anyway, the guy who did my nails was more focused on texting rather than doing my nails,  his quality of work for the price was ridiculous...customer service was just plain terrible......however I did have my eyebrows waxed and that was great

name: Maria Jose Gomez Leiva
text: The place was very dirty.I told the person to do something on my nails and they didn't do it because someone else took care of me.

name: Amino uploads
text: Worst French Tip I've ever had. It was more like half white instead of white tip. And they make is obvious they are talking about you in their language. Most nail shops are discreet about it.

name: Elizabeth Preston
text: I always go to Jay! He knows I love glitter and puts the prettiest colors together for me. I won’t let anyone else do my toes or my nails. Everyone at the salon is nice and it’s very clean. They stay busy so I def recommend an appt on the weekends. I’ve been to several nail salons around town and haven’t been anywhere else since I found this place (and Jay!!).

resp.text: It is awesome. Love to see you in love with our service. Come back to see us soon. We have many more fantastic services for you to try.

name: Goldee Locks
text: Great experience and pricing was adequate.

resp.text: You are very nice. I appreciate your time leaving feedback for our store. See you soon.

name: Victoria Jae
text: Will never come back here again! The man rushed through my pedicure and manicure. There’s no reason a pedicure and manicure should only take 20 minutes altogether! I tried to ask the man not to cut my nails and he pulled my hand and said “I do what I want okay” . I spent weeks growing my nails out for my wedding for him to cut them off! Not even 24 hours after getting a manicure the polish is chipping. All I did was wash dishes. This is so ridiculous!! Now I have to re paint my own nail for my wedding in 3 days.

name: Santana Laycox
text: I bought my daughters in to have gel nails put on. We had to correct them SEVERAL times while they they were doing the design and they still did it incorrectly. They also got polish on their fingers and didn’t clean it off. The jewels came off the next day and they were rough & rude when I was sitting in the waiting area for them to finish. It was our first time visiting & we will NOT be going back

name: Lena Monae
text: Alan is FANTASTIC, he did a gel fill-in for me over a month ago and I hv requested him ever since🥰 He takes his time and very gentle... I would also recommend Lena, she’s very thorough too!!!

resp.text: It is awesome. Love to see you in love with our service. Come back to see us soon. We have many more fantastic services for you to try.

name: ashley smith
text: Definitely not coming again. They were very rude and they did a horrible job on my nails. The last time I came they refused to do a design on my nails because I wouldn't get gel colors on my nails. He also refused to do a finish on my nails this time because he said that they only had it in a gel color which is not true because I've gone to several other salons in Dothan and they definitely do it! I will not be returning! Absolutely ridiculous

name: Jenn Hutch
text: Came about 2 weeks ago, got white tips with design on big toe. It was okay, came back today to get the same thing done and when I said "white tips with design on big toe" it was like I was from another planet. When the service began I had to correct the tech 4 yes FOUR times, and she kept talking to the other employees a d giggling in a different language. I ended up just telling her to please just stop. Then they charged a different price than the last time. I understand my toe on the right foot is broken which can pose a difficulty but two weeks ago the designs atleast matched and were decent. 😡 won't go back!

name: jessica “jessiekat29” king
text: The first visit was not "terrible" and I was happy with the initial acrylic set but every fill in since was absolutely horrible. The techs are all rude and have no bedside manner. One of the younger men made me so uncomfortable a few weeks ago and stared at me the entire time rather than paying attention to my nails. They are all in such a rush and do not pay attention to what they are doing. They laugh and talk to each other so much and could care less about their job.  The last visit was the last straw when the girl literally "filled and painted" my nails and was done within 15 minutes. She left a chipped piece exactly the same and did not attempt to file or even just cut it down although when she asked if i wanted a cut down i said yes. She was in such a hurry she cut me with the file on 4 different nails.  It is the first and only time that i did not even leave a tip and i normally tip very well. I have since gone back to my roots at Pinky Nails where I should have stayed and have been going for 10 plus years and they were able to fix what this place messed up, thankfully.  It is sad that this place charges so much more than so many other places for shi**y work and it is not just one specific employee. I have had 4 different employees do my fill ins and they are well terrible.

name: Tammy Shelley
text: Lena does a great job. The shop is very clean and their score is 100

resp.text: You are so sweet. It was great to have you as our customer. Hope to see you soon.

name: ayanna cummings - jones
text: I took my niece their was charged 65 dollars for a full set which the man stated with gel polish it was 45 ok.. now for length it was 5 extra and for the suppose to be coffin shape extra 5 still don’t equal to 65 , the manager was very rude not professional at all.

name: Summer Stokes
text: I will give my whole experience a absolute 0 stars!!!!. I have never had that much trouble getting my nails done!!!. I will recommend NO ONE to go there!!.... The service i got was so rushed and very very sloppy! I am a very patient person but my nail tech was beyond rude.!!!. I ask for something very simple and was told it could not be done! Just polish all over my nails I mean a complete mess. I got them repainted by the manager I believe and he seemed annoyed as if I had did it to my nails. I have barely had the nails a week and they are falling off....! I'm writing this review and its something I don't do... But I think people should know if u plan on going there to be careful of who does your nails its a beautiful shop but very horrible service!!.... i would not waste my money....

name: Amanda Stetzel
text: Not friendly at all and roughest pedi I have ever had not enjoyable at all

I prefer the dip because it last longer and they look the best when I get them done here, they shape your nails perfectly, I highly recommend

text: I haven't gotten my nails done here once without people raving about them! I along with everyone else always love them! The customer service here is awesome and they always get me finished in good timing, yet never slacking on the outcome! I love it here! Been coming a little over 2 years now!

name: Celeste Jones
text: My experience was horrible. My toenails were cut too short, very uneven and not painted completely.  I had a rough place on my toe and I had to asked her three different times to please concentrate on that and please make it smooth. She also cut my foot and I was bleeding. I now have a scab. She got toenail polish on my sandals as well. I will not be back. Possibly the worst pedicure I have ever had.

My acrylic nails are TO THIN!! I can see right through them... they all tried to suggest gel but they SHOULD not advertise they they specialize in acrylic because he did a horrible job... I will not.ne going back here... I dont even know why I tipped him to be honest because he did not do well at all. Not worth my time or money any more

text: I visited this salon for a full set and a pedicure. The pedicure lasted ten minutes and my feet was never scrubbed or filed, and I still need a pedicure. The worst service ever, and very overpriced. Never will I visit this location again.

name: Courtney Quinn
text: Some of the employees do great work others seem mad that you are there.

resp.text: You are so sweet. It was great to have you as our customer. Hope to see you soon.

name: Megan W
text: Awful.  My pedi lasted ten minutes.  didn’t even have any polish on my toes when I arrived.  My feet were scrubbed for about 39 seconds each, my toe nails weren’t even filed even.  The paint job consisted of two uneven coats, no clear coat.  I was told to sit in the chair for ten minutes after the sloppy coats were slapped on.  I waited for 15, then I  asked if it was done.  25 dollars wasted!!!!  I have never not left a tip of at least 10 bucks anywhere before I visited this sorry place.  Save yourself the money and go elsewhere...I think we all know that a pedi should be a relaxing experience...mine was over here with 20 minutes left on the junk massage chair.  I wish I would have gone elsewhere.

name: Donna Davis
text: I came to this shop to have a pedicure & it was an awesome experience but above that they told me about a new nail system called SNS. It's amazing!! I drive an hour to get here. That should tell you how amazing it is. The staff is always so friendly!! Tan is my nail tech & he's the best nail technician I've ever had!!!

name: Sonia Bush
text: Always friendly service. Tan you are the best..and Jay

name: Jo Mayhall
text: The spa cost more than some salons in Dothan. They also said on the phone that they served wine while you are there. They do not. They are also verry pushey and do not take no for an answer. They will keep trying to upsell and it makes it hard to relax. The job was well done so I'm still giving them four stars.

name: Alison Grommes
text: Horrible. So disappointed, this is why i go to one place only. will not go back to this place if I was paid too, did not shape my nails at all or once pick up the color I asked my nails to be painted. Then when I asked they had a attitude about it and laughed trying to act like I’m dumb. Sorry but never again🤦🏼‍♀️🤯

name: Christine Oglesby (Gadgetgirl)
text: On my first visit I was quickly taken and attended to by Emily. She gave me a very nice spa treatment/mani-pedi/ with gel color. They have lasted over two weeks and I'm going back to get a fill in and see how it all goes. More info coming after a few more visits.

name: Linda Utz
text: My new favorite nail salon. My daughter and I have been going here to get our nails done since November 2012 and we have been really happy with their service!!! Store is clean, beautifully decorated and convienently located. They also offer pedicures too. Love them!!!

name: Anonymous
text: Great place, great services, great staff and workers. Also great prices! All around a great place for self maintenance.

name: Tina Smith
text: The food was pretty good. I would come back.

name: Deborah Isler Mercer
text: I needed to find a new nail salon and just happened to see this one when I was going to Publix. I was kind of skeptical to start with, because it had the same name as another one in Dothan I had went to (and it was horrible). I am so glad I went in. I had the best pedicure ever! Also, had dip on my fingernails and they look beautiful! Thanks Danny! 😀

name: MJH PPG
text:
Horrible!
Typical, no English speaking
No one really to talk to about waiting for over 45 mins to even be seated.
Wouldn't bring my dog here.
Will not be coming here EVER again.

name: Linda Lucas
text: I am very particular about my nails. So happy with the kindness in the shop and excellent job by Alan. I’ll be a regular customer. Thank you!

resp.text: Wonderful. I am smiling reading your feedback. Customers’ satisfaction is the energy for us to work better. Love to have you back soon.

name: Maggie Smith
text: I enjoy going here. It's the only nail place I use in dothan. Very friendly people and they meet your needs very well! i recommend them to anybody!

name: Crystal Waltman
text:
I was disappointed.  They have such great reviews... made a appointment ahead of time and was upset at how rushed they were..
I've not had this bad of experience in a while. Not sure if I will try them again.

name: Theresa Ward
text: The best nail salon in Dothan Al.  I definitely will come back when I’m in town. When I get back to Atlanta I have to tell the nail salon I use to step up their game. Great Job!!!!! 🤗

resp.text: Thank you very much for your reviews. We always try our best to make you happy. Please come back soon.

name: Blackhorse Solutions
text: Very meticulous.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your feedback. We were glad to serve you.

name: Sheila Brown
text: My daughter and I, whom are African American walked into the salon..No one spoke..I said to myself ok, they are busy..Well when this Caucasian lady and her daughter came in...a worker went over asking what they wanted, and was about to  seat the lady for a pedi ..I said excuse me...we were here first....he said you need service I said yes we both wanted pedicures and my daughter was going to get dip polish...he left we didnt see him for another 6 or 7 mins..rhis time he bought her nail colors to look at...then came back talking to her...we and another black lady left...I refuse to spend my money where it isn't appreciated...Sistas please open your Salon...Im in town visiting...can't waut to get back to Atlanta... I told my daughter I hope she took note....Racism True in effect!!! Because of our Beautiful Skin...If he needed to see a LX purse, I had one in my car...SMH

name: cheryl brantley
text: My first visit several months ago was great so I decide to revisit. Very disappointed with service this 2nd time. My daughter and I felt very disrespected. After waiting 45 minutes  just soaking in plain water your tech finally ready to start and she wanted me to wait for a lady who called the shop asking for her from Wells Fargo 10 mins prior to her arrival and you want me to wait longer. Your staff raised her voice at my daughter. Very unprofessional !! Never set foot in your business again !!

name: Shannon Ebersole
text: Super nice people and always great service. Clean comfortable salon, highly recommended.

name: KIMBERLY BROWN

name: Vivian Langley
text: Great atmosphere, friendly service and Danny did such a good job this morning.  Plan to return again!!👏👍

text: They are awesome I have been going to these nice ppl for sometime now!!' I LIVE IN FLORIDA SO THAT SAYS ALOT!!!

name: Kim wanderlust

name: Felicia Register
text: The staff is great. The owner's wife is a different story. She is very rude and disrespectful.  Apparently she has a problem with black people. This is my last time coming to spend my money at this establishment.

resp.text:
Hi Felicia,
Thank you for sharing your review, as it helped to clarify the miscommunication. At the time of services, you made some loud noise at the salon that might affect other customers, so we politely asked you to lower your voice. There might be misunderstand and language barrier between us that make you feel uncomfortable. At our salon, customers are our priority and we treat everyone the same. No one is different. We apologize for making you feel that. Best regards.

name: Nathaniel Vana
text: As a guy who is picky about how my hair is cut, it has been super hard to find someone to do it right. I feel like I tried so many different barber shops and salons hoping to find one that works. Well I found one and that was Capelli Salon. All the ladies at the salon are a great and welcoming. I’ve been going here for a few months now and it is just a great environment all around. I am glad that I found this place. I would recommend this salon to any guy ( or girl ) looking to have their hair done right you will not be disappointed!!!

name: Judy Langford
text: Christina is the best. She is very good as a stylist. She listens, pleases and sweet.

name: Gina Smith
text:
Wonderful place!!
Emma did an awesome job on myself and my family members love her too!

name: Karen Pruitt
text: Love the folks at Capelli!  Always a treat getting my hair styled by Betsy! ❤

name: Regina Gargollo
text: First time visit - I called them in the morning to see if I can get a balayage that day and they said yes. Very easy to set a same day appointment. Emma did a fantastic job! I will be coming back for sure.

name: Lisa Phillips
text: I walked in to the salon on a referral from a friend. The scariest thing it sitting down in a chair and hoping the stylist can "read your mind" and "capture the same vision" you have for your hair. She didn't know me, my personality, or what I liked or didn't like. I was nervous...what if she messed it up? What if I didn't like it? Immediately I was at ease. Everyone was so sweet and the atmosphere was very professional, clean, and calming. Not only did I get a GREAT haircut, I immediately knew I would be back for my color appointment. Another perk--no drama among the stylists! Professional yet friendly! I have even referred a friend there now and she had the same great experience. Best form of advertising is word of mouth! So glad I was referred to Capelli!

name: Amy Gable
text: I overheard a woman talking about getting her hair done here, and she looked great, so I looked it up and booked an appointment. I’ve been back 3 times and absolutely love it! They did a great job! I’ve has Kelly and Kathryn both do my hair.

name: Inmi Brandsema
text: I’ve always had great cuts and service for the past 2 years. The the salon is very flexible and I have always been able to make an same day appointment. I usually see Jerri or Julia. They are great. About a week ago, I saw someone else and I had a terrible experience. Part of it was on me since I did not specify my hair type (long and thick hair) but they also never ask. The stylist seems to be stressed about how long it was going to take to cut my hair. She did not attend to the details and how you can see every layer in my hair if you don’t cut it properly. She ran out of time before her next appointment and sent me to someone else to finish drying my hair. She never came back to check on her work. It was so choppy and uneven. I was so upset about my service. I went to a different salon to get it fixed. Sadly, I will not be returning to Capelli.

name: Bernadette Fraser
text: Very professional & nice personnel, always helpful with good advises, I love the way how beautiful and tidy the rooms are. You will feel very well treated (spoiled) after a visit. 100% recommend

name: Debbie Faris
text: I brought my sister here in July 2016.  I requested a cut/style and highlights and my sister got just a cut and style.  I showed my stylist (Julia) a photo of what I wanted prior to her starting.   When we were finished my hair looked nothing like the cut or highlights I requested.  My sister was very unhappy with her cut also (Katherine did hers).  Both of us had very chopped up cuts which were not the same from one side to the other.  We had negative comments from both friends and strangers who saw our hair later.  Neither of us could style our hair to make it look presentable.  I ended up cutting my own hair and my sisters to clean up the mess.  We were then able to style our hair better and got approval from friends and family.  For me this was the worst professional cut I ever got.

name: Sarah Oswald
text: Best atmosphere in Birmingham. Katherine’s taken me from jet black to blonde without damaging my hair. Absolutely recommend

name: Tanja Rodriguez
text: Have been going there for a while and LOVE Katherine!

name: Paris Wane
text: This place is amazing! April gave me a great cut, listened to everything I was asking for and recommended products for me to try. Great atmosphere, friendly staff. Will definitely be back!

name: Jennifer Summar (NextJen)
text: Great salon with friendly & knowledgeable stylists. Massaging shampoos & reminder calls from the staff are welcome courtesies. Easy to get an appointment, too.

name: Claire F

Can’t say enough about the services and value offered by the veteran staff of Capelli.

They have a wide variety of talents among the stylists. Schedule an appointment and be prepared to forget other salons.  This is an awesome place!!!

Best Salon in Birmingham!!

name: BooksbyJacobRay
text: Flakes on Cancer Organizations in the name of profits! We had two events with Capelli both were for a rare neuroendocrine cancer. Our staff was told to ‘lower our prices’ so that Capelli could make more money & skip helping our cause. The staff there are racist, uneducated, shallow & care nothing about the community- just money! Go anywhere else! Their prices are as big of a joke as their politricks. Imagine flaking on a cancer organization- patients eager to see pictures, eager to read posts, but denied over Capelli’s interest in money.

text: I am so in love with my nails!! Christina is AMAZING! She did my nails for the first time yesterday....They have NEVER looked this good. Everyone is so friendly. Super clean salon. Just an all around great experience!!!

name: Brittany Fant
text: The girls at the salon did a fabulous job with my pedicure and my full set of acrylic nails. They are so nice and funny as well! This is my favorite new nail place! After 4 years of living here, I have finally found a place I love!

text: Christina is amazing! She always does an amazing job on my nails and I am so picky!! I have never left unhappy when she takes care of me. My nails are always perfect :) Highly recommend her!

text: Got a full set and pedi. Service was excellent and staff very friendly. Definitely will be making an apt and going back soon!

text: The best nail salon in Madison!! Nit and Jen are amazing and always so friendly. My nails have never looked so good before! Many people commented on my acrylics and told me how nice they looked. I have absolutely no complaints! If you go, make an appointment and ask for Nit or Jen!!! I highly HIGHLY recommend :)

If you aren't skilled enough to do the design then say it. Dont waste my time waiting. I have been coming to this place for years. Won't be back after that

text: Had a appointment with 'sang' but he was placed with someone else and then the young lady who painted my fingers left pieces of cotton stuckto my nails and then painted over it so my polish was terrible also my pedicure was rushed and pointless. Little overpriced.

text: I went to this salon for a pedicure a couple of weekends ago with a friend that had gone before. The woman that did my pedicure was nice enough, but at one point while scrubbing my foot with the pumice-like tool, she was not paying attention and kept rubbing the inside of my foot with it. This caused the area to bleed and was very painful. Now a couple of weeks later I fear it is infected. I will not be going back.

text: Staff is helpful and friendly. Massage was fabulous. Facility is clean, spacious, beautiful, quiet.  Exceptionally clean and sanitized.  Great products. Great prices.  Highly recommend

name: Rory Blanks
text: I couldn’t be happier with the services that I got. The staff was always kind, courteous, and professional. I’m thrilled with the outcome of my services and would recommend Azia to anyone in the Birmingham area looking for what they provide.

name: Emma Marshall
text: John is one of the best masseuses I have ever been to! He has significantly helped my back and eradicated the day to day pain I was experiencing. I recommend him to everyone I speak to. Come see him, you wont regret it!

name: Savannah Swindle
text: I loved my massage! Nice and professional staff. Highly recommend!

name: Brittany Wilson
text: Love Azia Medical Spa.  I come once a month for the hydrafacial with Dee and I am obsessed!  I love how my skin looks and feels every single time!  Great staff and service for all your beauty needs!

name: Tammy Hyche
text: I absolutely love this place. The staff is so happy and helpful. I love my girl Dee, she is amazing at permanent eyeliner!!

resp.text: Thank you for your support, Tammy! We love hearing how much our clients love their results. If there's anything we can do for you, please let us know. -Lina D., Manager

name: Danielle O'Neal
text: I’ve been going here for a while, and never had a problem. Unfortunately today was very very different as they have had staff changes, today the atmosphere I was used to changed dramatically, I felt as though I was not welcome. Following the same routine for my appt I was scolded and talked down to.  I have no intention of returning they just lost a customer today. It’s a shame because I really enjoyed going there

resp.text: Danielle, we always want our patients to feel welcome. However, we're disappointed to read this review because this doesn't sound like our med spa. If there's anything we can do to welcome our patients back, we'd love to know how we can do that. -Lina D., Manager

name: Jeannine Ahlberg-Glenn
text: I have been going to Azia for years. They never fail to be the absolute friendly & offer the best service!  I have tried to go other places and they fail in most areas. I have lately gone thru Laser facials and Jacklyn has explained the benefits & the number of visits to reach MY satisfaction. Today I saw Dee for permanent eyeliner. This is my second time to have this process done with her. As with any tattoo they fade so I didn’t hesitate to see her again. Prior to ever seeing Dee I had my eyeliner done at another local spa. They did NOT numb and the pain was extreme & unbearable. I recommend this process with Dee HIGHLY. She relaxes me with her humor & bubbly personality. Can’t say enough about this spa on the edge of town.

name: Ashley Lee
text:
Great experience and professional staff!
Wonderful facials!

resp.text: At Azia Medical Spa, our clients will always be properly taken care of, Ashley. It's always a treat to read when our facials and services are enjoyed. Please reach out if you ever need us! -Lina D., Manager

name: Ange Goss
text: I love Azia Spa and the staff.  I've been going there for over 3 years and have never had a bad experience.  The staff are very friendly and informative.  I never feel pressured into doing a procedure I don't want to do.  The facility is very calming and inviting. Will continue to go there for all my spa needs.

name: Deidre Payne
text: They are so nice here. They make me feel good about being a customer. I recommend them to everyone, especially over Santa Fe Day Spa. The owners of Azia are decent people, making me feel better about spending my money here.

name: Ashley L. Spinks
text: The atmosphere is calming, and the staff is great.  Everyone is always friendly and genuine.  I wish it was just a bit closer but it's worth the drive.  The massage is amazing, and the skin products they sell are pretty amazing.  Again, it's far but absolutely worth the drive.  Highly recommend :).

name: Melanie Mann
text: I have been a client a Azia since they opened.  The staff is so friendly and knowledgeable.  The services are outstanding and reasonably priced.  I very rarely have to wait as they keep appointments on schedule and timely.  Krista has worked with me for both medical weight loss and skin treatments.  She is always readily available for questions, extremely concerned with getting the desired result and client satisfaction.  I have also been a patient for Dr. Cox for both botox and dermal fillers.  Krista assists him during my treatments.  Dr. Cox is always most concerned with giving me the proper treatment for the results that I want.  He is very honest and caring and always desires to keep results natural rather than over doing it.  Both Krista and Dr. Cox are caring and professional and I am always pleased with my results.  They are both more than willing to make adjustments if a client is not satisfied, although I have never had to go back for that.  They also call after a procedure to make sure you are satisfied with your results, which is rare for most spas.  I could not recommend Azia more highly due to the staff, the relaxing facility and the wonderful staff and service they provide.  They truly care about the clientele.

name: Alisa Kochergina
text: That was so BAD !!! They destroyed my face!!! Now im looking for a doctor to fix there mass!  I did fillers under my eyes . From first time it didn’t work so i needed to go through that painful Procedure one more time. They did like 8 stitchers under each eye... Almost for one year i have swelled Bruise under my left eye!!! And because of it i start to have one deep wrinkle there.... And it was my mistake to sign the paper that i will not sue them. After i did it they told me i should not come there anymore . And With that my eye problem what they did i should go somewhere else . OWNER WAS SO RUDE TO ME THAT DID NOT WANT EVEN JUST SEE ME TO GIVE AN ADVICE WHAT TO DO AND WHERE TO GO. Even though i was very polite with them all the time. Don’t make mistake i did. DONT GO THERE!

name: Gina Valentini
text:
Marissa, the receptionist, is so sweet, patient, and helpful. I loved being able to communicate with her via text, Azia's online chat feature, and/or in person.
Dee is absolutely amazing! She is so talented! Dee microbladed my brows and applied permanent upper and lower eyeliner for me. I am in love with the results!
Alex and Holly work behind the scenes to make sure all is as it should be at the spa. If you get to meet them, you are in for a treat!
Did I mention the spa is absolutely gorgeous???
If you haven't visited Azia, what are you waiting for???

name: Amanda Andrews
text: I had my first botox injections here, it was a trial run for me. I am more than pleased with the results. I felt at ease with Dr Cox, he answered my questions and his assistant was wonderful. She was professional and caring without being "fake". For everyone who frequents spas....you know what I mean! I am careful with how I spend my money and Azia spa is an investment in myself.

name: R Heffner
text: JASSIM PALMER AND LEDBETTER RUST MY 3 P.M. HONEYWELL AIRIES COMPTYPE SELECTRIC AUTO CORRECT PAT DOBBS

name: David Wakefield
text: I love going to Azia! I would have to say that it is the best spa in the Birmingham area. I have had a massage with Beth and Stephanie, and they are both great at what they do!!! They also have a really nice dream shower and sauna that I like to use after my massage. I always leave there feeling relaxed and refreshed!!!

name: Nameless Faceless
text: Loved every minute of my custom facial and massage. I will definitely be back. The facility is beautiful, peaceful and clean. Excellent customer service.

name: Chris and Tonya MacNicol
text: Marissa and Liz were great at the front desk. They really helped me understand the products and pricing. Jackie is amazing at knowing what my skin. Refs and offering the right solution!

name: Bella Allure
text: I am doing Venus Freeze treatments for loose abdominal skin at Azia and I have been thoroughly pleased with everything!  The Staff is amazing and the treatments are going well.  I have done two so far and will be on my third one soon; there are subtle results but I am sure the end result will be phenomenal from how things are progressing. -SM

name: Brittany King
text: Jackie is just the best! I actually went for hair removal but I had seen 4 different dermatologist to try and remove the dark spots on my face. I had given up hope. She recommended to try laser removal and I’ve had great success with the results. As a woman, to have dark spots on my face was so embarrassing and made me super self conscious. Jackie is so kind and professional and I feel like she recommends actual solutions. I’m forever grateful for my results and continue to go back for other services and I’m never not pleased.

name: Gabrielle Johnson
text: It was such an amazing deep tissue massage.

resp.text: Gabrielle, we appreciate the review! If we can help with anything, please reach out. -Lina D., Manager

name: R Heffner
text: JASSIM PALMER AND LEDBETTER RUST MY 3 P.M. HONEYWELL AIRIES COMPTYPE SELECTRIC AUTO CORRECT PAT DOBBS

name: Judith Moor

name: Helen
text: While the staff members were nice, I was very disappointed in the results of my visit. I bought a groupon for 100 units of dysport thinking that 100 units instead of 50 would be ample. I was a bit concerned when the nurse tried to confirm that I was a getting 50 units. I asked the doctor's advice about the coverage, and she did not indicate I would need to buy more units. It has been about a month, and I still have movement in all areas injected.  The wrinkles aren't as strong but still there.  Also the areas over the corners of my brows were not treated, and I have this strange Spock look when I raise my brows. Of course, I called after about 2 weeks to let them know that the treated areas still had a lot of movement, and they quickly explained that they do not do any re-treatment with Groupons.  I understand that I  supposedly got a "deal" but I also still paid for a service and was assured when I booked my appointment that I would love the results.. I know Groupons are to get new customers in the door but with this experience, I will not go back. I have used a Groupon at another spa, and they re-treated me to get the results that were expected.  I had an appt with my dermatologist a few weeks after this, and she said that 100 disport units should have taken care of all the areas I had treated. My experience may have been completely different if I had paid full price.  Lesson learned.

name: Keara Norris
text:
I recently had my first (but definitely not last visit) to Azia Medical Spa.  I had a GroupOn voucher & was a little concerned that I may be shortchanged because I was there on a “coupon”.  All my fears were immediately put to rest from the initial phone call to make my appointment.  I had let time get away from me and had less than a week to use my GroupOn voucher or lose the promotional value.  The lady on the phone, Katrina I think, was understanding & made me an appointment for the next day.  Bonus point because I was able to get my appointment on a Saturday.

When I arrived, I was greeted by name & offered a drink.  After paperwork, I was introduced to Jennifer Pyles who explained that she is double licensed and would do both my massage & facial.  I was extremely pleased with this because it allowed me to stay relaxed throughout the treatments and not have to move into a new area.  Jennifer was professional, attentive & through.  Her pressure level was perfect & she checked in occasionally to make sure it stayed that way.  She even surprised me by telling me she could tell I was right handed & spent a lot of time at a computer due to the tension level in certain areas.  That really showed me how skilled she is.  After the massage, Jennifer moved directly into my express facial.  She walked me through the process & gave me a brief skin analysis.  She suggested products & services I could benefit from.  She was also kind enough to suggest some over the counter products when I asked about them.  After the appointment, she left a list of the items & services we discussed at the front desk for me.

After my time with Jennifer, I was allowed to wait in the sauna while the nail technician finished with another client.  The temperature was just right for relaxation and I had to avoid nodding off.

Next, Badri Roshan, the nail technician came to get me for my manicure.  She was a very nice lady with whom I enjoyed talking.  I loved her accent & chatting with her about her background and what drew her to Birmingham.  As a testament to her work. I have received several compliments on my nails.

As I checked out, I neglected to get the name of the lady at the front desk but she was very friendly and helped me run my card to leave a tip for Jennifer & Badri.  I loved that while I was invited back, no services or products were pushed on me.  I am looking forward to all my future visits and spreading the news that Azia Medical Spa is money and time well spent!!!

They felt very strong and durable! These were 1 layer each with 30 second cure. Not sure what normal procedure is, but lasting 3 weeks vs. 6 days is disappointing.

name: Eric Luffman
text: I am huge on surprises! So I purchased a very expensive perfect package for my girl as a surprise Valentine's day present at this location bc ive sent her here once before and she seemed to enjoy it. Well the lady at the desk inquired on who it was for and apparently submitted the information under her name where as MY email confirmation went directly to my girl, where she called me informing me she knew my plans for her, spoiling the surprise!!! That should have never happened! I then called and explained my irritation and informed them I was coming for a refund. They called me back like it was no biggy like cool we can just refund this over the phone for you rather than saying hey i'm sorry is there any way we can make this right for you! I'm a funny, chill laid back dude, but if you ruin a surprise, that is my one and only immediate heartbreak bc that ruins the joy of spending lots of money to be able to see the expression on your womans face of how happy she is. Presents are for the givers and for the receivers bc we both enjoy feeling the happiness of THE SURPRISE!! Please resolve this issue, bc i'm a man of morality bc now my woman is upset with me bc I refunded the package but I simply can NOT do business with folks that aren't in it for the satisfaction of those spending their hard earned money! So now, I had Valentine's all planned out perfect to the T, I no longer have the "kaboom" gift available, and now there is all this negative energy between me and my woman bc I know she still wants the package but I can not allow it bc the surprise was so important to me i absolutely had to have my money back so that this place would know and preferably remember that they ruined something for two special people! I wouldn't dare ask for something free, I would feel bad for taking anything not earned, but as a man that runs  a business, I make free offers every day to ensure customer satisfaction and that they come back!! Moral of my story, do what is right, and right what you wronged!

name: William Ritchey
text:
I called and visited today Saturday. First off the place is being run by teenagers NOT a professional staff in any way shape or form.  The two time's I called kids answered the phone and acted like it was real burden on them that I asked directions.  See the address on Google is NOT where they are anymore as I found out the hard way. They have no webpage. When I finally got someone on the phone the attitude,despite my calm and polite voice, continued but they finally gave me the address on Hollis Crump Drive off 78.

I stopped by and yep its teenagers running it.  The staff as the front desk when I asked for information about joining just handed me a sheet and rattled off there 3 mth, 6 mth, and 1 year prices then looked at me all very expensive (over a 100 dollars for 3 mth and it go's way up from there). and said nothing else. They seem to think anyone who walk's automatically want's to join but when I asked for a tour I got a hate filled look but they went and got someone (yep another teenager) to do so.

This place is very plain, has no class, and seemed very crammed together to me.  Lots of equipment (big variety) that seemed taken care of.  The pool is NOT a pool but something only to do laps in and that's about it.  The do have a small sauna showers and the like. Most rooms where dark (light turned out) with no one it and there was very few people.

I would have tried it out but with piss poor and condescending attitude of the entire staff I met, the plain jammed together nature of the place, they high prices (no 30 day plan), I want nothing to do with the place and so should you.  They need to replace there entire staff with people who are professional  want yo make you feel welcome and to join be it over the phone or in person.  They do not..go elsewhere in my viewpoint.  I could not get to my truck fast enough...

text: I booked an appointment to get a gel manicure today. With my current work schedule I am unable to get to my normal nail place. When I arrived they staff was nice. I picked a color. They were unable to locate the color I picked. I waited and waited. Finally she brought me a different color which I approved. She continued to look for the original color while her son took over. The other member of her staff continued to sit and stare at her phone and eat and ignore her while she asked for help.  Finally after an hour he started doing my nails. He did a good job but when it was time to pay he then up charged me an additional $10 on top of the gel manicure cost when I asked, he said it was the charge to soak off my previous gel. There was no mention of this prior to service and I have never had a salon charge for this before. I am very disappointed in the time it took for the price.

This business is closed. I went to their website and there were no indication that they were closed. I was not aware until I got here and saw the entire place was cleared out. No information on if they moved or not so I just went to a different shop. Just a heads up to anyone reading this!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. I am so sorry to hear that you had a bad experience. I am the manager of the store. If you’d like to discuss this further, please contact me at the store’s phone number. Thank you.

name: Tangela Cooper
text: Very nice and friendly service and excellent on manicures and pedicures.

resp.text: Love to see you like our services. We have plenty more for you to try. We are looking forward to serving you again.

name: G G
text: First time in today and had a excellent experience really felt good and would definitely recommend this location

resp.text: Wonderful. I am smiling reading your feedback. Customers’ satisfaction is the energy for us to work better. Love to have you back soon.

name: Laura Mitchell
text: She filed my gel off with the drill which made my nails paper thin. 3 had broke within 2 days. It’s been a week and they are almost all broken and the gel is peeling off.

resp.text: OMG, sorry for the bad experience. We were probably very busy. But it could not be the right excuse for this issue. My apology for your unsatisfied services. Please call us ASAP to get it fixed. Thank you.

name: Sophie Richardson
text: I went here because Genesis wasn’t open.. asked for a coffin shape for my acrylic nails and dude did them square. Hurt when he “fixed” my cuticles and made them bleed. He was rough with my hands never going back. Only posted two stars because some of the employees were nice.

resp.text: Hi, I would like to apologize for your bad experience with us. I wish I were there to fix your issue right there when it happened. It is not too late to make things right. Please give us a callback and we can discuss how can we fix it. I appreciate your sympathy. Thank you.

name: Traci Lofgren
text: Best place ever! Beautiful, classy ambiance...great service by a team of thoughtful perfectionists! My SNS manicure and gel pedicure came out beautiful! Above and beyond service by every staff member. I highly recommend this place.

name: naaz dhanani
text:
Love ❤️ my nails and customer service!
Very clean and hygiene both store and employees. I definitely recommend this place .

name: Felicia Oliver
text: Very dissatisfied with Nail & Spa 150. Went in on a Saturday afternoon, there were very few people in the spa so I was taken directly to a chair for a pedicure. The owner of the spa ran cold water in my foot bath and when I brought it to their attention they told me to wait a few minutes and they would bring me some hot water to mix in with the cold water 😮. Meanwhile, 3 Caucasian customers walked in for pedicures and had hot water ran from the faucet directly into their foot bath. I watched in total disbelief as another manicurist walked from the back of the salon with an electric kettle full of hot water ready to pour it in the bath of cold water. Fortunately Hannah moved me to another chair and apologized for the incident. When I confronted the owner about the situation, her response was that the other 3 people had made an appointment....but she didn’t realize that I heard the appointment being made 5 minutes before they came in. So beware of Nails and Spa 150, apparently you have to have an appointment to get hot water for your pedicure 😒

name: Carlos Morales
text: Nice place location and excellent service..

resp.text: Love to see you like our services. We have plenty more for you to try. We are looking forward to serving you again.

name: Terri Nicole
text: Great place. They offer excellent threading and waxing Services through Ashraf who is  highly trained and so wonderful to work with. I get my eyebrows lips chin and bikini wax from her and I couldn't be happier. I can't recommend Ashraf highly enough. You won't be sorry.

name: Katrina McTyer
text: Been going here for several years and really enjoy the service.  The staff is knowledgeable and pleasant to work with. I get my nails done with Tweety and my pedicures with whoever is available.  Never had anything to complain about and am overjoyed with my results.

name: Shannon Jenkins
text: Have searched for a nail salon that does a great job and is friendly! Found it! From the moment we stepped inside today the staff was super friendly and did a wonderful job! Will be going back for sure!

name: Jazmin Mcconico
text: Great atmosphere.... loved the employees and great service. I was serviced by Tweety. I received an full set , pedicure and eyebrow wax. I will definitely be back!

name: Erika M
text: Pretty good shop. I go to Hannah Lee, she does s great job!

name: Zulaikha Kazmi
text: At first, the place looked great and neat. Once we were seated, a Mexican lady started doing my pedi. She was talking on the phone constantly which i thought was extremely disturbing and unethical! How can you attend to your clients while taking personal calls! Anyway, once her calls (not one but several calls) were over, she scrubbed my nails with something so harsh that it has damaged my nailbed! I have posted a picture so you can see the scratches on my nail! Its been over a week and the scratches are still there. The other Vietnamese lady doing pedi for my daughter was mute as she did not speak english. She applied a callous gel on my daughter’s heels without her consent and then even charged us for it which i thought was unfair! She didn’t even want that gel applied in the first place! Anyway after leaving the place, my toe started hurting so bad. At first i ignored it. But when the pain didn't lessen after 3 days to the point that i couldn’t  wear a shoe, I had to see a doctor to get it checked for an infection. Thank god there was no infection but they had nicked the cuticle too deep, hence the pain. If only she wasn’t busy on her phone and concentrated on her job, maybe she’d be more careful! I would never recommend this place to anyone.

name: Barbara Martinez
text:
Never again!
My daughter and I went there and I  told the girl that was about  took care of my daughter to do a regular fullset acrylic and to use regular nail polish and she end up doing dip in's and gel nail polish then told me my daughter's nails was 55.00$ when my full set made of acrylic was 20.00 so I told her that was ok even tho that was not what I told her to do, this ladies give my daughter massage that my daughter told her not to and when I went to pay the owner told me it was 45.00 for my daughter's nails and 20.00 for mine and the girl that did my daughter's nails start yelling and talking on her language, the owner then told me it was 55.00 for hers instead of 45.00 I told no ma'am you already told me 45.00 twice and that's not what I want it for my daughter in the first place. End up paying 85.00 for nail and that gel polish didn't even last 24 hours.

name: Jocelyn Cabil
text: I received the BEST pedicure I’ve ever had in my life! Great energy and friendly atmosphere. Hannah did an awesome job 😊

name: Edlin Elizondo
text: Highly recommend nice atmosphere and very sanitary make you feel right at home

name: John Fang
text: What a wonderful place good service nice music ,very clean, and staffs are very nice. I love the neck and shoulder massage with my gel nails .they are serve wine too. I would highly recommend .

name: Evelin (Marlenne)
text: Never coming back to this place, very unorganized. The first time I had a good experience that’s why I came back, however I went back  three more times and every time was getting worst and worst. The last time I went, I had made an appointment with Tweety the owner and she never showed up, I didn’t mind waiting, however 30 mins later after my appointment I was still waiting on her and another customer shows up saying that she had an appointment with Tweety.. One of her coworkers calls her and tells her that she had already two people waiting on her and apparently she forgot about my appointment. After waiting for almost 40 mins for her to show up, I decided leave and go somewhere else, because at that point I was already frustrated and on top of that her plan was to get there and work in both of us at the same time.. I’m so glad I left and went somewhere else.

name: Carissa Custred
text: called Nail & Spa 150 after an absolute horrible experience at Model Nails in Mccalla. Tweety told me to come on in and they would help fix Model Nail’s horrible manicure. And boy, was she committed. The bad manicure didn’t even happen at her salon but she did everything in her power to make it right. She made sure I was happy, made sure I was okay and was so knowledgeable and thorough. I have already told all of my friends to go here. I am so impressed by their services and the genuine care they show toward clientele. Thank you for everything, tweety! See you next time 🙂

text: I was very pleased very one was super friendly Imelda is great very friendly

name: Courtney Nichols
text: I love Nail and Spa 150. I've been going for about 2 years now. I get a pedicure, manicure and eye brow wax and they've always done a fantastic job. The staff is very friendly and welcoming as well.

name: Lauren Ferrell
text: Honestly, the BEST nail experience I have had in YEARS!  All of the ladies were super sweet and very knowledgeable.  It is always so hard for me to “feel no pain” when getting a mani or a pedi, but these ladies....hands down....wonderful!  Loved the conversation and they made my 7 year old feel special too :).  Thanks ladies!

name: Amy Sherwood
text: Do yourself a huge favor and get your pedicure at Nails 150! The staff was so wonderful and listened to my individual requests. The Salon itself is so new and clean; and the nail technicians are so caring, and gentle as they perform their foot magic.

name: Kristin Hardin
text: Been going to see Tweety and her staff at Nails 150 for at least 10 years with my mother. She treats us like family and the service is always better than amazing. Couldn't imagine having to go anywhere else for whatever reason. Seriously.

text: A few months ago I moved here from Nashville to start law school. Nail and Spa 150 was the first nail salon I came to and I absolutely love it! Tweety and the staff are amazing and do a wonderful job. Tweety always does such cool nail art on my nails and I always get compliments! Will definitely be going here for the rest of my law school career 😊.

text: Love this place! Incredible people and always go out of their way to take care of me. Great people who do wonderful work!

text: Omg I love love love this nail spa. This will be my permanent shop. Tweety and the entire staff were wonderful and tweety provided excellent service. She was immaculate. Love love love..
